An Immersive Reading Experience

Rust Chronicles is an evolving epic fantasy/steampunk experience told through short stories, novels, novellas, audio stories, music and artwork.

The first incarnation of Rust is a short story collection - Rust Chronicles Volume 1 - which introduces readers to the world of Rust and recounts the central tale  of The Script Rebellion through the lives of individual characters within the larger narrative. The book features 25 individual stories, as well as bespoke artwork and an accompanying soundtrack (that's right, a soundtrack!).
Readers are encouraged to listen to certain tracks while reading specific stories to enhance the reading process.

column2: >Listen to the Rust Chronicles Soundtrack

>Indie artists and musicians from around the globe have been brought on board to help build the first volume of Rust Chronicles and we are just a short distance away from launching the book in all it's glory.

column1: As a Rust backer you'll be able to influence the direction of the Rust Chronicles saga by interacting directly with our creative team and even characters from the book itself. That's right, you'll be able to write directly to a character and ask them any question you wish. What's more, the character (not the author) will write back to you!
Rust Chronicles gives you a chance to find out more about aspects of the Rust world which aren't covered in a lot of detail and influence the direction of future writing.
We'll also be offering a pile of Rust merchandise for backers (postcards, magnets, bookmarks, weird little oddities) as well as a few surprises that aren't listed here in the campaign.
What to know more about the world of Rust Chronicles?

column2: >Head to the website:
>Rust is a city that sits at the center of the world of dreams
column3: ruled by a malevolent empress (The Red Queen) and three godling princes. The dreamworld is a harsh, unforgiving place and citizens of Rust cower beneath the oppressive rule of their cruel overlords. Led by a mysterious figure known only as the Shackled Man, some of the disenfranchised are fighting back, pitting their will against gods and demons alike.

column1: In recent times the boundary between the the waking and dream worlds has begun to thin. More and more people are slipping into the world of dreams, finding themselves lost in the red city, desperate and alone. Rust Chronicles Vol 1 traces the paths of some of these souls, beginning with stories that focus on the waking world and moving to those that take place in the dream world.

column2: >Rust Chronicles 1 begins with stories that focus on the waking world, gradually unraveling the mystery of the red city as it impinges on our reality. The second phase of the book focuses on characters within the world of dreams and nightmares and on the city Rust
column3: a city in the throes of rebellion.

column1: While Rust Chronicles could be described as fantasy/steampunk epic with dark fantasy elements, the short stories within this volume represent a range of genres
column2: from noir detective to paranormal, through first person diary to scholarly treatise. Some stories take place in the waking world and others in the world of dreams, written from a range of character perspectives and in different styles.

column1: For a taste of Rust Chronicles, download our free Rabble-rouser pack which includes exclusive short stories and a bespoke music track which are not included in the first volume.
http://www.rustchronicles.com/rabblerouser-campaign

Rust is populated with a large array of characters, from Hawaiian shirt wearing detectives to renegade outlaws, shadow-clad assassins to psychotic biomechanical fleshmancers. Below are just a few of the key actors in this epic narrative.

column2: >We of the Rust collective have already laid out funds for the production of the first Rust Chronicles volume, engaging indie artists, illustrators, musicians and creatives to bring Rust to life.
column3: >Money raised through this campaign will help us recoup some of those costs and support indie creatives from around the globe.

column2: >In the coming months we'll be looking to launch a series of Rust spin-off novels, novellas, illustrations, short story collections and possibly even a dedicated comic.
column3: >Anything we can raise above and beyond our target will allow us to create more Rust Chronicles artifacts (we really, really want to produce a comic!).

column1: Rust Chronicles is all about building a community of readers, artists and creatives who want to explore the Rust universe and engage with the discovery process. If you're an illustrator or comic artist and you'd like to contribute to the Rust universe, drop us a line and we'll chat!
column2: >If you've got an idea burning a hole in your head, or you'd just like to get in touch and share your thoughts on our work, get in touch, we'd love to talk with you.

>We'll be posting updates to Facebook and our web site over the coming months to let readers know about upcoming projects, freebies and competitions. Make sure you sign up to our newsletter to keep up to date with what's coming.

Below are a few previews of the book (note: grass not included):
Got questions? Feel free to drop us a line.
Thanks for reading and for your support!
Cheers
M. Quaid
","An Immersive Reading Experience Rust Chronicles is an evolving epic fantasy/steampunk experience told through short stories, novels, novellas, audio stories, music and artwork.

The first incarnation of Rust is a short story collection - Rust Chronicles Volume 1 - which introduces readers to the world of Rust and recounts the central tale  of The Script Rebellion through the lives of individual characters within the larger narrative. The book features 25 individual stories, as well as bespoke artwork and an accompanying soundtrack (that's right, a soundtrack!).
Readers are encouraged to listen to certain tracks while reading specific stories to enhance the reading process.
Listen to the Rust Chronicles Soundtrack

Indie artists and musicians from around the globe have been brought on board to help build the first volume of Rust Chronicles and we are just a short distance away from launching the book in all it's glory.
Join the Rebellion!

As a Rust backer you'll be able to influence the direction of the Rust Chronicles saga by interacting directly with our creative team and even characters from the book itself. That's right, you'll be able to write directly to a character and ask them any question you wish. What's more, the character (not the author) will write back to you!
Rust Chronicles gives you a chance to find out more about aspects of the Rust world which aren't covered in a lot of detail and influence the direction of future writing.
We'll also be offering a pile of Rust merchandise for backers (postcards, magnets, bookmarks, weird little oddities) as well as a few surprises that aren't listed here in the campaign.
What to know more about the world of Rust Chronicles?
Head to the website:  www.rustchronicles.com
A Taste of Rust
Rust is a city that sits at the center of the world of dreams
column2: ruled by a malevolent empress (The Red Queen) and three godling princes. The dreamworld is a harsh, unforgiving place and citizens of Rust cower beneath the oppressive rule of their cruel overlords. Led by a mysterious figure known only as the Shackled Man, some of the disenfranchised are fighting back, pitting their will against gods and demons alike.

column1: In recent times the boundary between the the waking and dream worlds has begun to thin. More and more people are slipping into the world of dreams, finding themselves lost in the red city, desperate and alone. Rust Chronicles Vol 1 traces the paths of some of these souls, beginning with stories that focus on the waking world and moving to those that take place in the dream world.

Rust Chronicles 1 begins with stories that focus on the waking world, gradually unraveling the mystery of the red city as it impinges on our reality. The second phase of the book focuses on characters within the world of dreams and nightmares and on the city Rust
column2: a city in the throes of rebellion.

column1: GENRE
While Rust Chronicles could be described as fantasy/steampunk epic with dark fantasy elements, the short stories within this volume represent a range of genres
column2: from noir detective to paranormal, through first person diary to scholarly treatise. Some stories take place in the waking world and others in the world of dreams, written from a range of character perspectives and in different styles.

column1: For a taste of Rust Chronicles, download our free Rabble-rouser pack which includes exclusive short stories and a bespoke music track which are not included in the first volume.
http://www.rustchronicles.com/rabblerouser-campaign
CHARACTERS

Rust is populated with a large array of characters, from Hawaiian shirt wearing detectives to renegade outlaws, shadow-clad assassins to psychotic biomechanical fleshmancers. Below are just a few of the key actors in this epic narrative.
The Rebellion Needs You!

We of the Rust collective have already laid out funds for the production of the first Rust Chronicles volume, engaging indie artists, illustrators, musicians and creatives to bring Rust to life. Money raised through this campaign will help us recoup some of those costs and support indie creatives from around the globe.

In the coming months we'll be looking to launch a series of Rust spin-off novels, novellas, illustrations, short story collections and possibly even a dedicated comic. Anything we can raise above and beyond our target will allow us to create more Rust Chronicles artifacts (we really, really want to produce a comic!).
How to get involved

Rust Chronicles is all about building a community of readers, artists and creatives who want to explore the Rust universe and engage with the discovery process. If you're an illustrator or comic artist and you'd like to contribute to the Rust universe, drop us a line and we'll chat! If you've got an idea burning a hole in your head, or you'd just like to get in touch and share your thoughts on our work, get in touch, we'd love to talk with you.

We'll be posting updates to Facebook and our web site over the coming months to let readers know about upcoming projects, freebies and competitions. Make sure you sign up to our newsletter to keep up to date with what's coming.
A Sneak Peak
Below are a few previews of the book (note: grass not included):
Got questions? Feel free to drop us a line.
Thanks for reading and for your support!
Cheers
M. Quaid",11.0,1,"1 Campaign

UPDATE: due to unforeseen (work doubling) circumstances, order fulfillment date has been moved to the end of January.

Hello!

My name is Melody Owen. I am an artist/writer, based in Portland, Oregon. I have  worked in sculpture, installation, collage, performance, drawing, curating, video, and photography. If you would like to see more, please see my website where there is a wealth of documentation and links.

melodyowen.net

I was raised in Oregon. Since my first sojourn to the Bay Area at age 17, I have gone away and returned many times. These past few years, I have become somewhat rooted. One reason being that working near the river provides me with so much inspiration. Also, the recession and a nervous breakdown in 2010 combined to flatten me like a steamroller. I exist in the space between two thin dimes.
column3:
/>

I started the Fremont Bridge Report in 2011, when my work studio window in the North Coast Seed Building directly faced the Fremont Bridge, a large arch of a bridge in over the Willamette. I stared at it every day. Eventually, I started to post observations on my Facebook wall. People seemed to enjoy it, so I continued.

Fremont Bridge Report

I started doing the River Reports after I moved from the Seed Building to a studio located directly on the East bank of the River. The two buildings are a very short distance from each other. River Street is both highly industrial and a mini wildlife corridor. So, the reports are often about ships, passing birds and mammals.

My current work studio is located in an old fire station built in 1924 for fire boats to dock at. We call it ""The Boat House"", though it is neither a boat or a house. Building occupants include two photographers, a filmmaker, a bicycle maker, a welder, a cluster of jewelers and me. My studio is in the garage and I sit and type right where the fire trucks used to park.

I post the river reports via Twitter (@thistlepress) and on my Facebook wall. Loyal followers of the Fremont Bridge Report and River Report encouraged me to create a book, and that is the goal of these funding efforts: The River Report, The Book. A full color  paperback book, it will include both sets of reports and some collages. Also, a few historical photographs and information about the site.

River Report

column1: The need for ""perks"" inspired the idea to write personal river reports for people and send them off on postcards. I like the idea of the river reports being circulated by post. I will make an official River Report ink stamp and hand stamp each postcard to reference its origin. I plan to print one or two postcards from photographs I have taken at the river. (depending on the amount raised)

In addition, I will make an audio book by reading all the reports myself. One of my geeky friends can record me. Most people will probably be happy with an MP3 but I will also offer old style CD and tape cassette versions in limited editions.

The book will be printed through Lightning Source which is owned by Ingram. It will be a small run but high quality print and have a bar code and be available on Amazon. The number of books I order will be determined in part by the number of orders I receive. I will do all the design work myself.

I have designed other books. Three of which can be found online, including the inside of the book pictured below which was published by Future Tense and Scout Books. I also have books out published by Container Corps and Publication Studio.
In 2011, I funded a successful project on Kickstarter
column2: a calendar representing the signs of the zodiac, each one depicted by a collage. I printed them myself, and used the proﬁt to buy a laptop for future projects
column3: the very one I am writing on now!

column1: I live on a shoestring budget, so when my computer died, my crowd absolutely saved me by funding that project (thank you, crowd!) and they all got calendars. This is the collage for Libra:

I've tried to make the rewards both affordable and interesting with many options. I feel and hope the goal of $1,800 is achievable. In which case, The printing costs for the the books and postcards will be covered. The rest of the funds will go to postage for print orders received and for shipping orders out, Indiegogo 4%, credit card processing 3%, and a margin of error and/or profit. It is possible I will add perks.

For the sake of keeping it easy for people to pledge, I have left it as ""flexible funding."" This means that I would get the money even if the project is not entirely funded. It is the only way to keep the option of using a credit card to pledge. You can also use Paypal.

In the case that I get only partial funding, I will still be able to make enough books and/or postcards to fulfill the pledges. I have budgeted the perks so that I will be able to make 100 books if 50 are ordered. This allows me the possibility to make some profit. If my math is correct, it also means that even if I fall short of my goal of 100 books, I will still be able to fulfill the awards I have promised.

I will have a book release party at the Boat House when it has been printed and delivered to me. Everyone who orders a book, cd or postcard report, is invited to the party. Come see the river for yourself. Winter party. We'll fire up the wood stove on the porch and make some mulled wine.

I am setting January 31 as the NEW deadline for delivery. Because of unforeseen circumstances, my work load has recently doubled until December 15. This means, it will take a little longer than I originally thought for the design process.

I see this as a wonderful opportunity to simultaneously print and distribute this book. I consider you my co-publishers.
 
If the project piques your interest, please help by sharing it with your people. If you have any questions, feel free to write me. Thank you!

About project

Hi, I'm Attila ""Pumukli"" Vegh - Recently I have achieved the title of MMA  world champion, but my way to the top wasn't always easy and straight. So I have decided to write a book about my unusual journey.

I believe that my story could be motivating and interesting for everybody. I'm describing how I started with wrestling at the age of 6 years just like any average boy in central Europe, how I  trained hard, won my first competition, than continued fighting like a wrestler and later like a Kenpo Karate fighter. Twice I became the world champion in Kenpo karate and finally I engaged myself in MMA fighting. In many moments of this book, I describe the difficulties of life and fighting sports, but also many of them portray the funnier moments in my life, and all this I would like to share with you via my book, which I'm preparing in cooperation with writer Pavol Sipkovsky.

Not only do I wish to tell you my story, but I also add two additional chapters to my book. First is about psychology of MMA fighting from my point of view. I describe how fighters feel before each combat or while they are waiting backstage for their fight and of course what they are thinking during the fight itself. Second part is about my training and preparation before the competition. What kind of trainings I apply and what's my schedule when I'm in the pre-fight phase. In this part, I would also like to describe how I rest after tough fights and what kind of supplements I use. I hope all of this will inspire you and be interesting for all of you guys who do MMA fighting.
The Book is almost finished. So far in Slovak language. We want to start translating the book into English, add pictures, print it out and advertise it. And for all this we need help from you guys.
<div>
<h3>What We Need &amp

As I have mentioned, we need your help with publishing my book. Our goal is to make 10 000$, because we think that this is the minimum amount necessary for successful publishing. We are expecting following expenses:
Translating book from Slovak to English by professional 2 000$
Pictures - we need to buy rights for photos from Bellator organization and other photographers. Expecting cost: Unknown yet.
Printing - more money we get, more pieces we will be able to print. Price for printing the book in full color and sending it to the customer is around 15$/piece (for example 300 books costs 4 500$).

Advertising - Our wish is make this book successful and well known. To achieve this, we need to make advertising campaign at the beginning. Especially through famous webpages dedicated to MMA. Expected cost is 2 000$. But the rule ""more money, more advertising"" applies here as well.

We are thankful for any help, so we prepared plenty of unique perks for you. You can choose which one is the most interesting for you. Of course, we offer you the book in both electronical and printed version
column2: also you can get original MMA gloves signed by ""Pumukli"". ...and much, much more including a special chance to train with the world champion!

column1: Maybe you are wondering now, where will all your contributions go if we don't reach our goal. No worries, if we don't reach our goal, we will use funds for translation and for photos to finish the project in order to send perks to all our contributors.
<div>
The Impact
If we reach our goal we will do all the best to make book perfect.
Here you can see how we plan for the book to look like if we acquire enough funds to translate it and buy all photos:
For fullsize view click here.
For fullsize view click here.

Only with your contributions we will be able make book as nice as you see above. We also do our best when it comes to the content. Attila tells his story and thus forms the book´s content. Paul is responsible for text and all necessary graphics.
We hope that book will be prepare for publishing in July 2013.
<div>
Other Ways You Can Help
Just tell the world about our project. Share it via Facebook, Twitter, Google+, mail, personally...anyhow
We will be very thankful for that.
Thank you!

 LINK TO MY NEW CAMPAIGN
http://www.gofundme.com/3v08ik
Thanks for Viewing My Campaign
<h2><span style=""font-size: 10px

I am working on a children series called Penguin Brother Adentures.  I am working with a fantastic artist as you can see from her drawings.  I have been working on the seriers for a while and felt the best way to release it would be as an interactive app.  For the interactive part I am still deciding on what I want for each page.  The one option I know it will have is a read it to me option.  Their are so many otpions on what you can do.
The program I will be using is called Kwik http://www.kwiksher.com/work/
the link will allow you to see what the program is capable of instead of me trying to explain it :)
The Lowdown of what I need
To create these apps their are many things I need:
Kwik Software, Photoshop, Corona SDK, Mac In Cloud, Licences.  I have been trying to set money aside for these things, but the price adds up quickly.
The Impact

Kids tend to enjoy playing games, watching movies on Tablets, which is fine some of the time.  However, I want to make reading fun and have kids choose reading over playing games all of the time.  I feel utilizing technology like Ipad and android tablets, will help more kids enjoy reading.
How to make this possible
Donations Donations Donations :)

column2: >If you cannot donante, letting people know that the first book app will be available in Mid Octorber on the android, ios would be a big help.

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div>
Bettering Mankind Through Medieval Play

As a member of the Society for Creative Anachronisms I have been researching medieval ages for several years. My particular area of interest is one that has not been widely researched by many in academia or, in fact, by many others.

Sports and games in Medieval Europe is a topic often overlooked, the first book in the series Past Times will delve into this area listing a variety of games, their history, and how to play the games. With the Past Times series I intend to shed light on toys, games, sports and the general pastimes of history.  The first book in the series, already in progress will be an overview of a variety of games that would have been known to the Medieval European and how to play them, future books will cover other time periods, specific detailed histories on individual games or family of games, toys, and the list will continue to grow.
Contents of Book I
This is not a complete list by any means, but here are some of the games that will be covered in the first book:
<ul>
• Tafl games, from Hnefatafl to halatafl, and everything inbetween
• Morris games
• Chess
• Noddy
• Curling
• Stoolball
• Shrovetide Football
• Bowls
• Trucco
• Skittles
• Baste The Bear
• Blind Man’s Bluff
• Battledore and Shuttlecock
• Many more….
Upcoming Titles:
<ul>
• Go Fly a Kite
• Chess
• Tafl Games
Where the money will go
The goal is to create a professional quality self published book for distribution.
The Budget:
Editing fees (based on the cost to get the first few books professionally edited) - $2,000
Cover Art - $500
Perk Expenses - $500
Marketing Expenses (book store displays, travel to events, advertisements, etc.) - $1500
Administration fees - $500
Total Cost: $5000
While this is the goal, less or more, it all helps towards the endgoal of having these books get on the shelves and into the hands of the people who want to learn and play.
Why Self Publish?

This is a common question I am asked. The fact is this book series is a very niche market and appeals to a limited group of readers. Most large publishing houses avoid such books like the plague. Many small houses do publish niche market books, but they usually have their own speciality. If I find a publisher who fits the series I am certainly willing to approach them, however there are costs still involved in marketing the book and as such funds raised through this campaign are still very much needed. If no publishing house is interested traditional publishing can still be approached at a later date if the first book, or subsequent books are successful. Publishing houses are much more willing to take a risk on authors with a proven track record. Self-publishing will most likely to be the best route for at least the first few books.
What happens if we don’t meet our goal?

The book will still be published, but not as much funding will be able to go into the production of the book. We may have to cut corners on cover art editing and marketing, but the things will still go forward, so any amount you can put forward is appreciated. You will still get the perk you were pledged to recieve, our project will still go forward it may just take longer to launch.
What happens if we collect more than our goal?

Then we are able to increase the budget on things like marketing, provide for the creation of more books in the series and generally improve the quality of the end products, this would also speed up the launch by date and possibly shorten the time between volumes.
The Perks

On the sidebar is a list of a variety of perks, most are pretty self explanatory. I will however state the leather hand-bound versions will be bound by the author using medieval coptic binding techniques. Reenactors will be able to carry these books to events without interrupting the medieval feel of the event. As these are hand bound books they take a while to complete, expect a delay between when the book is published and available for sale and when the leather bound perk books arrive.
<div>
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:
<ul>
• Help spread the word about this campaign, share this campaign on facebook, twitter, email, any way you can think of. The more people hear about this the better the end product will be.
• Once the book is published ask your local bookseller to carry the books.
Referral Contest
I am announcing a new contest, you can win a free copy of the eBook, or if you are already a funder getting a copy of the book get upgraded to the next perk level for free.

Want a cooler perk? Share this campaign for a chance to get your perk upgraded, the top three funders who uses the “Share This Campaign” tool to refer friends to this project the most will get an upgrade to the next level of the perk. If you haven’t funded the project you can still participate and if you win you will get upgraded to the e-contributor perk. Funders who donated less than $15 will be upgraded to e-contributor level as well should they win.
As an additional bonus the top five referrers will get a special thank you on the acknowledgements page.

While no purchase is necessary to participate having an account and indiegogo is mandatory in order for me to be able to track referrals. Membership in indiegogo does not require you to contribute towards this, or any campaign, and they do have a strict privacy policyhttp://www.indiegogo.com/about/privacy.
Only referrals from this date forward count. Start spreading the word.

My Project

column3: >I Run, A Novel
column4: > tells the story of one woman’s search for meaning after she almost loses everything in a bus collision.

column3: >Sally Lane Brookman is a soccer mom who is quietly addicted to drugs and alcohol
column4: she is a quirky, irreverent intellectual trapped driving a crossover SUV in the suburbs. She feels trapped and out of place, better than and yet worse than the standard, shrink-wrapped moms circling her like a swarm of cicadas on her boring cul-de-sac. She feels like every woman and yet no woman, and at the heart of her sense of isolation is a mess of dark secrets, long since buried, that are all spilling out because of the accident.

>will speak to female readers who are in recovery for addiction and sexual abuse, but it will also resonate with readers who want to believe in lasting love. Indeed, I Run tells a passionate but mature love story: a tale not so much of love at first sight so much as love that endures and even grows as Sally and her husband William head into the autumn of their lives together.

> also will speak to male and female readers who are searching for answers spiritually, because one of its main themes is the quest for God. Sally realizes that she needs God's help to stop running away from her past, present and even future
column5: indeed, she must run toward Him if she is going to figure out the answers eluding her.

column1: <h2 class=""MsoNormal"" style=""margin-bottom: 12.0pt

column2: >In January, I self-published Ripple. An Amazon #1 Bestseller, Ripple has received 71 reviews, and sales are increasing each month due to good word of mouth. More than 2,300 readers have bought or downloaded Ripple and Ripple YA. Ripple has been described as a must-read book for survivors because it helps people heal.
>I Run will help people in much the same way. And it will touch those who feel spiritually lost.

column1: <h2 class=""MsoNormal"" style=""margin-bottom: 12pt
I absorbed all the editing, design, marketing and promotion costs for Ripple, but I need help bringing I Run to market. I am looking at the following costs:
<ul>
• $2,200 for editing costs. This covers everything from developmental editing, to line editing, copy editing, and finally, proofs.

• $500 in cover design. In order to garner a place in a very crowded market place, it's absolutely essential that an independent author invest sufficiently in graphic design in order to make her book stand out.
• $125 for an ISBN number--for the soft cover book I will be creating via Ligthning Source.
<li>$75 to pay Lightning Source for set-up fees. It's necessary to self-publish through LS in order to get I Run into the Ingram and the Baker &amp
column2: Taylor catalogs, respectively, which is what bookstores and libraries order from.

column1: The Impact of your help:
I can write more books that help women heal!

I am already 25,000 words into drafting Wave, the sequel to Ripple. The story picks up five years from when the first book ended, and it will show Phoebe's struggle to overcome her anger and her need for vengeance against her abusers, one of whom has just been released from jail. It will also show Phoebe finally letting go of her father's memory, which wracks her with shame and guilt and pain.

Wave will show Phoebe's friendship with the Christ-like Jamie (the head of the therapeutic riding program at the Bryson House), who has found a way to forgive her own attackers, and the reader will meet Jim John McMahon, a mechanic who has recently left the Army. Jim John loves his mama, his country, God, and from the moment he meets her, Phoebe.

Like Phoebe, he also suffers from PTSD. He and Phoebe meet in class, where they're both studying literature. In her arms, he feels safe, and in his arms, Phoebe finds a release from the angry tides that churn inside her.
Wave takes the healing in Ripple much further. It will really help abuse survivors and it will gently wake people up from the nightmare of abuse and PTSD. It will, I hope, also wake people up to God.
But like an old-fashioned artist in need of a patron, I need help creating. I need a small investment from you in me.
<div>
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can’t contribute, and I get it!! But that doesn’t mean you can’t help:
Please share this link, tell your friends how much my writing means to you, and help me make some noise about my campaign.
Please LIKE this campaign and use the Indiegogo share tools.

Thank you so much for your support!

","My Project
I Run, A Novel tells the story of one woman’s search for meaning after she almost loses everything in a bus collision.
Sally Lane Brookman is a soccer mom who is quietly addicted to drugs and alcohol
column2: she is a quirky, irreverent intellectual trapped driving a crossover SUV in the suburbs. She feels trapped and out of place, better than and yet worse than the standard, shrink-wrapped moms circling her like a swarm of cicadas on her boring cul-de-sac. She feels like every woman and yet no woman, and at the heart of her sense of isolation is a mess of dark secrets, long since buried, that are all spilling out because of the accident.

column1: I Run will speak to female readers who are in recovery for addiction and sexual abuse, but it will also resonate with readers who want to believe in lasting love. Indeed, I Run tells a passionate but mature love story: a tale not so much of love at first sight so much as love that endures and even grows as Sally and her husband William head into the autumn of their lives together.

I Run also will speak to male and female readers who are searching for answers spiritually, because one of its main themes is the quest for God. Sally realizes that she needs God's help to stop running away from her past, present and even future
column2: indeed, she must run toward Him if she is going to figure out the answers eluding her.

column1: My Experience

In January, I self-published Ripple. An Amazon #1 Bestseller, Ripple has received 71 reviews, and sales are increasing each month due to good word of mouth. More than 2,300 readers have bought or downloaded Ripple and Ripple YA. Ripple has been described as a must-read book for survivors because it helps people heal.
I Run will help people in much the same way. And it will touch those who feel spiritually lost.
What I Need
I absorbed all the editing, design, marketing and promotion costs for Ripple, but I need help bringing I Run to market. I am looking at the following costs:
$2,200 for editing costs. This covers everything from developmental editing, to line editing, copy editing, and finally, proofs.

$500 in cover design. In order to garner a place in a very crowded market place, it's absolutely essential that an independent author invest sufficiently in graphic design in order to make her book stand out.
$125 for an ISBN number--for the soft cover book I will be creating via Ligthning Source.

$75 to pay Lightning Source for set-up fees. It's necessary to self-publish through LS in order to get I Run into the Ingram and the Baker & Taylor catalogs, respectively, which is what bookstores and libraries order from.
The Impact of your help:
I can write more books that help women heal!

I am already 25,000 words into drafting Wave, the sequel to Ripple. The story picks up five years from when the first book ended, and it will show Phoebe's struggle to overcome her anger and her need for vengeance against her abusers, one of whom has just been released from jail. It will also show Phoebe finally letting go of her father's memory, which wracks her with shame and guilt and pain.

Wave will show Phoebe's friendship with the Christ-like Jamie (the head of the therapeutic riding program at the Bryson House), who has found a way to forgive her own attackers, and the reader will meet Jim John McMahon, a mechanic who has recently left the Army. Jim John loves his mama, his country, God, and from the moment he meets her, Phoebe. Like Phoebe, he also suffers from PTSD. He and Phoebe meet in class, where they're both studying literature. In her arms, he feels safe, and in his arms, Phoebe finds a release from the angry tides that churn inside her.
Wave takes the healing in Ripple much further. It will really help abuse survivors and it will gently wake people up from the nightmare of abuse and PTSD. It will, I hope, also wake people up to God.
But like an old-fashioned artist in need of a patron, I need help creating. I need a small investment from you in me.
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can’t contribute, and I get it!! But that doesn’t mean you can’t help:
Please share this link, tell your friends how much my writing means to you, and help me make some noise about my campaign.
Please LIKE this campaign and use the Indiegogo share tools.
Thank you so much for your support!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

About the Project

The Minneapolis/St. Paul region has many talented writers constantly evolving their craft and creating stories and worlds beyond imagination. This anthology in a collection of some of the best of those stories, written entirely by local authors. Some stories take place in far away worlds, while others take place right here in the Twin Cities. This project will allow for the anthology to be funded, including printing, cover art, distribution and advertising.

What We Need

To reach our goal to publish and print the anthology, we will need to raise at least $3000. This will encompass all the printing, copyrighting, cover art, and technical aspects of publishing the book. Any additional funds will allow for higher caliber editing as well as greater inventory and a stronger marketing campaign.

Now if it so happens that we do not reach our goal, we will not be deterred. There are lesser publication packages that we can pursue and the books will still come out, however our marketing and production options will be severely limited. So the more donations the better!

Our estimated availability date (accounting for writing, editing, publishing, all that jazz) is April 1, 2014.

 

What You Get

The donation levels are as follows:
• $5 - You will receive a personalized thank you card.
• $10 - You will receive a voucher for an ebook as well as a personalized thank you card.
• $25 - You will receive a hardback copy of the anthology as well as a personalized thank you card.
• $40 - You will receive a signed hardback copy of the anthology as well as a personalized thank you card.
• $70 - You will receive two signed hardback copies of the book, two ebook vouchers, and a personalized thank you card.
• $90 - You will receive two signed hardback copies of the book, two ebook vouchers, a thank you in the acknowledgements section, and a personalized thank you card.
• $150 - You will become a character in one of the stories.

The Impact

The joy and love of writing is something that many experience. Often times people write for themselves, for loved ones, or for anyone who has interest. With a market heavy with novel length stories, short fiction often goes unnoticed. This anthology will not only get those stories published, but will highlight the local talent of the Twin Cities in the process.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute, worry not! There are other ways you can help:

• Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. There are tons of people out there who read and who like to support local artists. We certainly don't know them all. Be a pal and let them know.
• Remember to use the Indiegogo sharing options. Social media works wonders.

About the Stories

Here's a short list of some of the stories that will be in the Anthology:

• Alone in the Great North, a bereaved mother rescues a lost urchin from a  raging blizzard, only to find the girl is being hunted by a killer who  will stop at nothing to get his hands on this mysterious child from the  storm.

• Little things like tweezers, spare change and car keys have gone missing in Gail Newman family’s home her whole life. Who would suspect a rift in space and time, a zero-dimension, to open up in your living room? Gail can't believe her eyes when things in her home begin disappearing right out of her hand or off her coffee table. Will it get worse? And where do all those missing things go?
• A humorous tale of a guardian angel neglecting his duties and jeopardizing his soul, all for the sake of love.

• What if all the male settlers died in a plague on an outworld planet? After centuries of quarantine, would you expect to find an uninhabited planet or would you find a very different kind of society?

• Mikhail Weiss has always tried to avoid conflict. In his work as a Prospector, stripping the ruins of extinct alien civilizations, there's quite a lot of it: between treasure hunters and ideologues, between those who want to bring back technologies developed by the dead species and those who are afraid humanity is headed in the same direction. Now a living sentient species has been discovered, and people from all corners of Prospector culture have come together to study them. Among a slew of old friends, rivals, and the highest stakes of his career, Mikhail will finally need to choose what he believes in.

• Harry Hawkins—daring adventurer, treasure hunter, thrill-seeker... and world-famous CEO of an American corporation. This legendary figure agrees to share with an up-and-coming writer a day of his exciting life, a day that will see them both travel into an ancient tomb, and encounter a horde of the undead...
• Determined to avoid the same fate as his ancestors, Prince Py sets off on his own to break the curse on his family.
• Haunted by memories of his past and visions of the future, one man must weigh the cost of pride against the pain of regret.
• When the earth is threatened, its not just the  military that steps up to help, volunteers come in all shapes and sizes.

Alright folks, we've got less than 24 hours remaining and we're nearly a quarter of the way there. I know you're probably tapped out from holiday shopping, but perhaps consider this a holiday gift to some local artists. As always, thanks and any little bit helps.

I am a writer and involved with the arts on many levels.  Celebrating and supporting these slam poets is a celebration of the best St. Louis has to offer.  Representation at the regional competition will be possible because of this campaign.

The registration is paid.  This campaign will be used to cover the travel expenses for the team members.  100%.  All of it.  These gifted poets have cultivated their craft and battled their way to win the spots.  Travel expenses are all that remain between them and regional competition.

Short Summary

Our educational retreat centre is fantastic. When people come out to Wintergeen Studios they relax, eat well, sleep better, and they are able to focus and create fantastic poetry and short stories. But we have a problem. We are remote! Not everyone can afford to drive out here, and because we get the very best Canadian authors, not everyone can afford our tuition fees. We are passionate about making our writing workshops more accessible, and giving young writers in particular a ""leg up"" in their initial investigations. Please help us provide a free workshop to three students for our Lawrence Hill writing workshop (Book of Negroes, Any Known Blood), and three students for our Helen Humphreys (Leaving Earth, Coventry) workshop with Kelly Aitken.
<div>
<h3>What We Need &amp

Each workshop fee is approximately $800 for three days of accommodation, meals, and tuition fees. We also want to pay someone to pick up our participants at their homes and deliver them to our retreat centre. We are located between Westport and Verona, Ontario, on 200 acres of land. Our space includes woods, private cabins and a lake, so our participants have a truly wonderful stay with us! We also have a literary press, so in exchange for your donation of $100 or more ($150 if you are in the States), you get a book called ""Writing at Wintergreen"" that is an anthology of writing about the land and our participants' relationships to it.
<div>
The Impact

We wish we could afford to subsize tuition fees ourselves, but we are a very small organization. We have only 3 part-time employees and we are a not-for-profit, charitable organization. Your donation will help us do more in our community. We advertise locally and word is spreading about our activities, but our remote location and our fees are prohibitive for many low-income families and students. We want to change that. We feel everyone should have access to our incredible writers and artists. And we feel everyone should have a chance to leave the city for a weekend and enjoy the outstanding Ontario countryside.
<div>
Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot donate yourself, we would be so grateful if you would email this to another person you know who might be able to donate, or who is connected to a wide group of book lovers, writers, or patrons of the arts. Thank you so much!
Meet Our Candidates

Our first candidate, Hannah Ellsworth, is a confirmed participant at Lawrence Hill's workshop in late April at Wintergreen Studios. Ashley-Elizabeth Best, our second candidate, is slowly receiving donations to subsidize her attendance as well. Read more about these talented young women by clicking the Gallery tab, above.
","Short Summary

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div>
""House of Lies""

People across the globe are beginning to feel as though an unseen world of lies and deceit exists behind every corner. “House of Lies” blows the lid off this hidden world and details the manipulation and dark agendas perpetrated against us by the global elite. There are underlying truths behind many world events, religious doctrines and widely-held beliefs that are quite simply unknown to most people. Within the pages of this book is a detailed examination of these truths, breaking down each idea and showing how they are all well crafted lies created and used to control us.
Numerous books have been written on the subjects of conspiracy theories, religious history, secret societies, philosophy and social commentary
column2: but few put them all together in one easy-to-understand book. My book presents new information that hasn’t been seen before, as well as giving a completely different perspective on how the world really works. Broken down into three main sections, I prove beyond a shadow of a doubt that conspiracies do indeed exist, and that there is a dark force behind all of it. The first section covers the philosophical issues concerning the intangible aspects of life. These include the different theories on the origin of mankind, how the universe was created, what the reality is behind quantum theory, the role extraterrestrials play in our world, the effect television has on society and the dark side of the Hollywood industry.

column1: The second section focuses primarily on our five-sense reality and the conspiracies taking place within it. These include a critical look at America’s drug culture, an examination of the major forms of government, and an investigation into the hazardous and dangerous activities of corporations, banking institutions, schools and the prison system. The third and final section of this book looks at a secret world hiding right in front of us. It begins with the history, practices and beliefs of the primary secret societies in operation today, followed by a detailed explanation on how religions are connected to these same mystery schools. The next chapter discusses international pedophile rings and their connection to organized crime, government and worldwide intelligence agencies. This section concludes with a chapter on the occult symbols and symbolism that is frequently used all around us, examining each symbol’s multiple interpretations and usage.
""House of Lies” has approximately 450 pages with 160,000 words
column2: using quotes, references, and almost 150 pictures to properly explain each subject. I uploaded two sample chapters to this page in pdf format for those who would like to check out my work. ""Sample Chapter 4: The Box"" is also available on my blog at:

column1: http://shamanskat.blogspot.com/
<div>
Your Contributions

Trying to get a book published for the first time reminds me of looking for work in today's times. Read nearly every career advertisement and they all want the applicant to have two-three years of experience before they will even consider hiring them. The problem comes in that if you have no experience then you won't be hired, and if you have experience then you probably already have a job. So how does anyone go into a new field in this situation?
Nearly every advertisment for a book agent or publishing company says the same thing
column2: they want the potential author to already have a ""foundation,"" i.e., a large number of people who have already read their work. Essentially, if the potential author has no audience then they can't get published, but in order to get an audience they need to be published. Does this make sense? Well this is the situation myself and other authors are in when trying to get this important information into the public arena. It leaves us with only one choice, self-publishing.

column1: In order to publish a book on my own, I need the startup funds to do so, which is where you excellent people come in :) My stated goal is nothing extravagant, just what I need to get a jump start on this process. I am asking for $12,000 which will be broken down as follows:
<ul>

• Approximately 1/2 of the money will go towards online advertising. As I have not utilized ""social media"" to grow an audience, I will have to do things the old fashioned way. This includes using software like Google Ads, and paying fees to various website owners to place links and information about my work.
<ul>

• Approximately 1/4 of the money will help to pay for the book to be printed on paperback. It might be cheaper and easier to strictly go the 'e-book' route, but I know there are a lot of people out there like myself who prefer reading physical books. It is for this reason that I will need paperback copies available.
<ul>

• The last 1/4 of the money will go towards any problems or issues that arise in this long process. It is always important to have the money there if any obstacles present themselves opposed to leaving out any unforeseen circumstances that could potentially hinder the release of my book.

Even if I don't reach the full goal, the money will still be divided in the same manner. $12,000 is what I need, but if I have to make do with less then so be it. Either way it is my mission to get this information out to as many people as possible despite anything that stands in my way. Some things are just too important and I feel my book is one of them.
How Can One More Book Make a Difference?

My answer is simple, the more people who are reached with this type of information (and there is a lot of original research and new material in my book), the less people there are who believe the manufactured reality being force-fed to them on a daily basis. When people understand what is really happening in the world, they no longer believe the lies, and therefore no longer go along with the elite's agenda. One of the more important aspects of this book is that it explains to the reader that they don't need any other person in charge of their life
column2: telling them what they can or can't do, and telling them what they can or can't think. If such an easy concept could be understood by the majority then they wouldn't continue handing over their lives, minds and souls to people who couldn't care less about them. The underlying theme of this book is to ultimately regain control over ourselves and stop repeating history.

column1: Looking throughout our past I have noticed a vicious cycle that doesn't seem to end. At some point a government or leader becomes tyrannical and begins abusing and stealing from the populace. As time progresses a smaller group of ""revolutionaries"" take form and eventually gain enough momentum to take down the tyrannical government and replace it with a new one based on their values. This works fine for a while until another power-hungry person, or group of people, take control and become tyrannical. At that point another group of revolutionaries is formed, takes them down, and installs another  government that will once again become tyrannical. This has been happening throughout our known history and unfortunately I can see the beginnings of it occuring right now. This is not the answer, as it will only lead a future generation into the same situation we're in now. The real solution lies within each and every one of us. We need to attain the ability to think, act and live for ourselves
column2: never again handing another person the power to control us. Only then can mankind live in harmony. As I stated this is the underlying theme of the book, which goes into far more detail on this philosophy, and how it might actually be possible.

column1: For those who contribute, you will be helping to make a dent in the power structure of the world elite, along with helping the masses learn how to take back their power through knowledge and awareness.
<div>
Don't Have Any Available Funds You Can Spare?

That is alright as well (I am in the same situation!). Please help me by simply getting the word out about my book, and this campaign. I don't use social media so I don't have access to large numbers of people to get my message out. If you use these websites, please forward this page and help me get this project going. Doing so will help us start taking back our power.

What Is Golgotha?
column5:
>Hi. I'm Pastor Josh Mancini of Church of the City in Providence, RI and I'm raising money to write my next book: Golgotha. Golgotha, the place where Christ was crucified, literally means hill of skulls. It was a place of defeat, a place of death and is a representation of our lives without Christ.

Golgotha has a two-fold purpose. First, is for the Christian. It is a daily devotional in which I take a look at different Scriptures with short anecdotes, studies and amusing tales in order to walk through the seasons of Lent (40 days + 6 Sundays) and Easter (50 days).

The second purpose is for the non-Christian to explain Lent and Easter. To help the non-Christian understand the Sacred time in the Church's calendar and to show that, in Christianity, God came down for us (in the flesh) and died for us (for we were sinners).

Why Funding?

I self-funded my last book, Forty Days for Christmas (
column8:
keywords=Forty+Days+for+Christmas"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">here) and while it was certainly successful in terms of volumes sold (reaching #1 amongst devotionals in the US, Canada, Germany and the UK) I found myself more often behind then ahead. As these things cost money, alot of my own expenses were being paid out of pocket or being loaned. So, some funding might help...

For what?

column1: • Editors. While my last editors volunteered, I believe the Bible is clear when it says a workman is worth his wages (1 Tim 5:18) and I would like to pay my editors.
<li><span style=""line-height: 1.45em
column2: >Distribution. One of the major hindrances was buying enough books to distribute and I know if I had a bit more financial backing, I could stock local bookstores as I pleased.

column1: • Publishing. It's going to be printed-on-demand, which makes ordering books (even for myself) a tad pricier.

Making an Impact

Forty Days for Christmas was my first devotional and when it went to first run print, I received feedback nearly immediately. People were reading it in therapy, people were enjoying it with their morning toast, people absolutely loved it. Christians and non-Christians came to enjoy the writing which encouraged others and I believe with Golgotha, the same can happen.

Other Ways You Can Help

Perhaps you can't help with monetary donations...
• That's cool. Pray! PRAY! Seriously. I could use ALL the prayer I can get :)
• Share it with your friends on Twitter and Facebook using #Golgotha and sharing this link! It will really help.

The War Story You Haven't Heard... A Veteran's Story You Won't Believe.

During WWII, selected servicemen faced gas chamber tests and other chemical experiments secretly conducted by the US government. These soldiers were sworn to secrecy and threatened with imprisonment for noncompliance.  Nearly 50 years later, veterans started coming forward due to declining health. Mr. Rollins Edwards is one of these veterans.
Mr. Edwards' story of courage, strength, and triumph against all odds will motivate and inspire the masses. With your help, we can write and publish his inspirational journey.
<div>
What Will Your Donations Be Used For?

• Printing • Transcription services • Professional copy/line editing • Professional proofreading • Photo editing • Cover design/book interior layout • ISBN/Copyrighting • Shipping/processing• Set up fees • Marketing, advertising, promotions
<div>
What Makes Us Qualified To Tell This Story?

This project is led by Michael T. Owens, a writing professor who has taught courses at the College of Charleston, Columbia College -Naval Weapons Station, and Trident Technical College. He is  also a freelance writer with a passion for telling stories of overlooked individuals.
<div>
How Else Can You Help?
Help spread the word! If we surpass our goal, we plan on donating copies to schools, libraries, and other organizations.

column13:
>HELP FUND MY FIRST BOOK!

Leader Lies | 10 Truths I Learned As A Liar

column1: • My name is Matt Wade, a campus pastor at Cross Point Church, Nashville, TN.
• The purpose of this campaign is to help fund my first writing project.

• By helping me fund Leader Lies, you are investing in the lives of church leaders around the globe. You are also making a local impact by helping fund our church building expansion at our local church.
What We Need &
• $4500 is my goal. This allows me to fund the entire book project and obtain 500 advanced copies of Leader Lies.
<li>There are three giving tiers: $25, $100, &amp
• All contributors will receive an advanced, autographed copy. Based on the contribution amount, your perks just get better!
• 100% of the funds go for two purposes: 1. Fund the entire book project. 2. Once the project is funded, HALF the sales from the books go to fund our church building expansion.

The Impact

If you know me, you know that I am passionate about church leaders, particularly pastors.
<li>

Leader Lies will help foster a new level of freedom in leaders and pastors by causing a desire in them to be 100% vulnerable and honest with God, people around them, and themselves. Who wouldn't like to help with that?
• I have been writing about subjects like this for 4 years and have seen tremendous feedback from leaders around the country. So many people are impacted by my raw approach to church and leadership.
• Not only are you helping me make Leader Lies a reality, you are also helping our local church grow into a new building!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:
• In just a few days, you will be able to download the book images and share on your Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter platforms.
• Sign up HERE to receive updates about the book's release!

And that’s all there is to it.

Welcome to my campaign! My name is Candice Crews, I'm a mother of 4 boys, a licensed cosmetologist, writer, illustrator, and entrepreneur! 

I love all things hair and art! My love and passion for these things led me to write a children picture book series encouraging young girls to embrace their natural hair!  My debut book Niya's Crown will be followed by KoKo's Curls and more titles will follow after that! 

This book is so important for adolescent girls! When our kids feel good about themselves they have to confidence to try new things and are also more likely to try their best! Self-Esteem also helps kids cope with mistakes, and encourages them to try again, even if they fail the first time! It helps them do better at school, at home, and with friends! When children think that others won’t accept them they will feel unsure of themselves and let others treat them poorly! 

It is my wish that every little girl and child will embrace their natural beauty whether it be their hair, body type, features, or just themselves as a whole.

Niya's Crown was written to help young natural girls feel good about their hair! For Years Natural Hair has been shamed and looked at as unclean, unprofessional, or just plain wrong! Being natural is the new trend and it not going anywhere! Every little girl needs Niya's Crown in their book collection, and with your help it is my wish that we can get this book into as many of their hands as possible. 

I need your help with funding the remainder of my printing costs, I've done most of the work myself using the talents that God blessed me with
column2:
such as the writing, illustrating, cover design, formatting editing, which has saved me a TON of money! Your contribution or pre-order of Niya's Crown will help cover the following: 

$399 Fee to make my book available for sale to the largest network of global book sellers, libraries, and online retailers. Including BooksShop and distribution to Amazon, Powell's Books, Barnes &
column4:
Taylor, and 50 + others! 

$125 Purchase of ISBN. The ISBN is a unique identifier for a book or other book-like product (such as an audiobook) that specifies its format, edition, and publisher. An ISBN improves the likelihood your book will be found and purchased. An ISBN enables more efficient marketing and distribution of your title. Most retailers require ISBNs. Correct use of the ISBN allows different product forms and editions of a book, printed or digital, to be differentiated clearly, ensuring that customers receive the version they require. An ISBN ensures your book’s information will be stored in the Books in Print database. ISBNs are the global standard for book identification

$400 Trim size, Soft Cover printing that will make my book flexible with glued bindings, Gloss Cover finishing and a laminated gloss coating to protect the book cover and add a radiant sheen, perfect binding on a heavy weight, white gloss coated stock great for full - color printed books, Full Color Interior Printing on the inside of my book's body

$931 to print the first 50 copies at $14.90 a book and $186 for Next Day Shipping

I cant wait for you to get your copy! Thanks in advance for your support!

Scrisori din Zürich

Te-ai gândit vreodată că ai putea fi personaj de roman? Nu? Probabil nici personajele mele. Într-o lume digitală, David și Una se întorc în timp când gândurile oamenilor circulau în plic cu timbru și își scriu scrisori.
Sunt sigură că te vei regăsi, în râs, în reflecții, în ironii ușoare și discuții serioase. „Scrisori din Zurich” e o oglindă a unui puzzle al realității. Iar una din piese poate fi a ta.
După plată și răsplată!

Deși cartea are un final, drumul ei încă nu s-a încheiat. De aceea te invit să parcurgem împreună bucata care a mai rămas: mai am nevoie de 2500$ să trimit cartea la tipografie, unde va fi creat un tiraj de 1000 de urmași. O poți ajuta să se perpetueze prin patru variante:
<ol>
<li>
Cartea cu autograf -  din tipografie trece pe la mine să-ți las un gând bun și-apoi e a ta.
<li>
Două cărți cu autograf – una pentru tine și o idee bună de cadou pentru cineva drag ție.
<li>
Cartea cu autograf și un ceai cu poveste - vom ieși mai mulți la un ceai să vă împărtășesc din culisele cărții.
<li>
Cartea cu autograf și cină cu personajele - ne întâlnim cu oamenii din care am creat universul cărții la o cină plină de voie bună.
Când ajunge la tine?
La început de aprilie, după lansarea de la finalul lui martie, o îmbrac și ți-o trimit acasă.
Dar din dar se face rai
Raiul unei cărți îl reprezintă cititorul. Fă-mi un dar din darul tău și spune-le și altora despre această campanie.
Planuri?
Dacă toate merg strună, la pragul de 5000$ îi fac o copie în engleză și încerc să-i fac drum și prin alte țări.

STORY OF MY BOOK 

DYNASTY dives into the greatest teams in NBA history. I, for the purposes of this book, defined a dynasty as any team that won at least three championships in a five year period. Only eight iterations of teams have accomplished that feat (Jordan’s Bulls did it twice but its counted as one dynasty). Every chapter is a look at a different one of these eight dynasties: how they were built, how they sustained their success, and how they eventually fell. From there, I’ll be taking a look at the similarities between these eight great teams, and using those comparisons to evaluate all 30 teams (with a cute little formula I made) today in the NBA.

My name is Agu Ibanez-Baldor and I am the author of DYNASTY. I wrote this book because I wanted to see who could be the next NBA dynasty now that it looks like the Golden State Warriors are wrapping up their run (also, the NBA season as a whole might be cancelled, so, there's that). I also wanted to take a look at all of NBA history, specifically its greatest teams. I wanted to see what, if anything, these teams had in common.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover a new way to look at NBA history and teams today. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for basketball in you. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you get into twice as many fights on Twitter about who the GOAT is. And hopefully you guys’ll learn a thing or two, too.

In this book, you'll learn about not just achieving success, but also sustaining it:
• Bill Russell’s Celtics and their eight straight NBA titles
• Michael Jordan’s two three-peats in eight years
• Lebron James’s eight straight Finals appearances

You will love this book if you love NBA basketball for its great games, players, or #NBATwitter content.
DYNASTY is a non-fiction book that speaks to old basketball fans and young basketball fans who are looking at the best NBA teams of all time compared to each other for the first time.

 

The Book - DYNASTY

The book is written in 3 Parts....

Part 1 contains the introduction and the 'Respect Your Elders' chapters. These chapters include the First Dynasty in the NBA (the Minneapolis Lakers) and Bill Russell’s Celtics.

Part 2 contains the 'Modern Era' chapters. These chapters include all your favorite 80s and 90s dynasties like the Bulls and the Lakers right up to the most recent dynasty in the Golden State Warriors.

Part 3 contains the 'BONUS FUN' chapters. These are three chapters on teams or players (hint hint) that didn’t necessarily qualify as dynasties, but I wanted to talk about them regardless. Something about rules were meant to be broken and all that.

Whoo, that got a teensy bit serious for a second, huh? Well don’t worry because in addition to an in-depth look at the greatest teams in the NBA’s history, those looks will be accompanied with hordes of sarcastic comments that I sprinkled throughout the book (narcissistic or funny? I’ll never tell).

 

What I Need &
column2:
What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

column1: • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July 2020
• The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
• The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
• The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
<li>The Launch &amp
column2: Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this summer!

column1:
When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
• A personally signed copy of my book when I publish
• A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
• Your name will appear in a Special Acknowledgements section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
• Early access to the Introduction of my book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
• The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
• I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

And more... (dramatic and ominous, enticing isn't it?)

 

About the Author

Agu Ibanez-Baldor is the son of two immigrants (Argentinean mother and Chilean father, since you asked) and was born and raised in Milwaukee, WI. He has written for Lineups.com and has been an avid basketball fan since childhood.

It isn’t a love for basketball pushing him to write this book. While that love is there and it is great, its an obsession that pushed him to write this. He’s always loved the game for its play but has always been fascinated by the mechanics behind building a team. The draft, trades, free agency, etc. Putting the puzzle pieces together. Sometimes they get put together a little more perfectly and a dynasty is born. He wanted to see how those puzzles were put together. Which brings us to now.

For more information you can connect with Agu Ibanez-Baldor at aguibanezbaldor@gmail.com and @aguibanezbaldor on Twitter.

 

Risks &
column2:
Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #DYNASTY and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

 

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Agu

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div>
La guerrera drager ofrece una nueva visión de la eterna lucha entre el Bien y el Mal...

column2: >Los guerreros dragers han combatido a sus enemigos desde su creación dos siglos atrás por un mago. Su destrucción total parecía algo imposible hasta que nació Ran, una hexen, cuyo poder podría resultar la solución definitiva para eliminar a los dragers. Cuando Ran se gradúa como guerrera drager su aventura para eliminar a estos terribles seres comienza.

column1: ¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una editorial con voluntad de cambio, de publicar obras poco convencionales pero de indudable calidad, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para promocionar cada título cuando esta todavía se encuentra en proceso de edición.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.
Hoy te presentamos Elena Siles.

column2: >Nacida el 7 de agosto de 1992 en Rota, Cádiz, es directora de www.youarewriter.es desde 2013 y del Rincón Literario de Gente de Rota desde 2015. En 2014 publicó su primera novela de suspense llamada La prueba. Dirigió una revista, Er Bisho en el instituto IES Castillo Luna durante 2008-10. Ganó varios premios en 2013, 2016 y 2017.

column1: ¿Por qué?
Y por aquí una muestra de lo que encontraréis en sus páginas:

column2:
>«—Gracias —dijo Jorell a sus discípulos—. Así pues, demos la bienvenida a la alumna más brillante que he conocido y que será la primera marcada como guerrera drager de esta noche. Por favor un aplauso para Ran.
          Ran subió hasta el atril donde se encontraba Jorell y le sonrió algo colorada, aún estaba nerviosa.
          —Maestro Jorell. —Le tendió el brazo derecho—. Es un honor recibir la marca de uno de los guerreros dragers más grandes de nuestra historia.
          —Yo como maestro drager, líder y comandante de nuestros guerreros te marco a ti Ran, hija de Ainara y Yannik. —Jorell cogió el hierro que tenía a su lado, lo calentó hasta tenerlo candente, después marcó a Ran en el antebrazo derecho—. ¿Aceptas jurar lealtad a Yaevdhal y respetar nuestras leyes
column3:
y servir y proteger Yaevdhal como guerrero drager?
          —Sí —dijo con convicción Ran.
          —Te proclamo pues guerrera drager. Enhorabuena.
          Al ser una marca mágica permanecería en su cuerpo hasta el día de su muerte, así que Ran alzó orgullosa el brazo y todos los discípulos aplaudieron. Bajó del atril todavía con el corazón desbocado y caminó hasta su madre. Ainara la abrazó con mucho cariño. Era el día más feliz de su vida y pensaba celebrarlo con sus amigos y compañeros. Sian estaba al lado de Ainara alegre, esperando que esta dejara de atosigar a Ran para poder abrazarla.
          —Mi querida niña, tu padre Yannik estaría tan orgulloso de ti.
          Ainara se separó de Ran con una lágrima.
          —Gracias, mamá.
          —Vamos, mira están allí —indicó Sian.
          Abel y Hebe les saludaron. Ran se entristeció y Sian la miró.
          —¿Qué te pasa?
          —Me encantaría que Tula estuviera aquí —se sinceró Ran.
          —Bueno, por ahora olvidemos el pasado y celebremos nuestro futuro.
          —Enseguida vuelvo ―dijo Abel antes de marcharse.
          —¡Vamos a bailar! —gritó Sian y cogió a Ran de la mano y salieron a bailar».

column1: ¿Cómo?
Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 880€
column2: esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

column1: <ul>
• Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
• Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.

column2: >Aviso para navegantes: La opción BACK IT es únicamente para realizar donaciones a la edición, por lo que no habrá comunicaciones posteriores en busca de datos de envío... cualquiera de las opciones válidas de reserva exige cumplimentar formulario para poder servir el pedido.

column1: Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona a la autora, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Elena Siles vea publicada su obra.
Gracias por vuestro tiempo.
","¿Qué?
La guerrera drager ofrece una nueva visión de la eterna lucha entre el Bien y el Mal...

Los guerreros dragers han combatido a sus enemigos desde su creación dos siglos atrás por un mago. Su destrucción total parecía algo imposible hasta que nació Ran, una hexen, cuyo poder podría resultar la solución definitiva para eliminar a los dragers. Cuando Ran se gradúa como guerrera drager su aventura para eliminar a estos terribles seres comienza.
¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una editorial con voluntad de cambio, de publicar obras poco convencionales pero de indudable calidad, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para promocionar cada título cuando esta todavía se encuentra en proceso de edición.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.
Hoy te presentamos Elena Siles.

Nacida el 7 de agosto de 1992 en Rota, Cádiz, es directora de www.youarewriter.es desde 2013 y del Rincón Literario de Gente de Rota desde 2015. En 2014 publicó su primera novela de suspense llamada La prueba. Dirigió una revista, Er Bisho en el instituto IES Castillo Luna durante 2008-10. Ganó varios premios en 2013, 2016 y 2017.
¿Por qué?
Y por aquí una muestra de lo que encontraréis en sus páginas:

«—Gracias —dijo Jorell a sus discípulos—. Así pues, demos la bienvenida a la alumna más brillante que he conocido y que será la primera marcada como guerrera drager de esta noche. Por favor un aplauso para Ran.          Ran subió hasta el atril donde se encontraba Jorell y le sonrió algo colorada, aún estaba nerviosa.          —Maestro Jorell. —Le tendió el brazo derecho—. Es un honor recibir la marca de uno de los guerreros dragers más grandes de nuestra historia.          —Yo como maestro drager, líder y comandante de nuestros guerreros te marco a ti Ran, hija de Ainara y Yannik. —Jorell cogió el hierro que tenía a su lado, lo calentó hasta tenerlo candente, después marcó a Ran en el antebrazo derecho—. ¿Aceptas jurar lealtad a Yaevdhal y respetar nuestras leyes
column2: y servir y proteger Yaevdhal como guerrero drager?          —Sí —dijo con convicción Ran.          —Te proclamo pues guerrera drager. Enhorabuena.          Al ser una marca mágica permanecería en su cuerpo hasta el día de su muerte, así que Ran alzó orgullosa el brazo y todos los discípulos aplaudieron. Bajó del atril todavía con el corazón desbocado y caminó hasta su madre. Ainara la abrazó con mucho cariño. Era el día más feliz de su vida y pensaba celebrarlo con sus amigos y compañeros. Sian estaba al lado de Ainara alegre, esperando que esta dejara de atosigar a Ran para poder abrazarla.          —Mi querida niña, tu padre Yannik estaría tan orgulloso de ti.          Ainara se separó de Ran con una lágrima.          —Gracias, mamá.          —Vamos, mira están allí —indicó Sian.          Abel y Hebe les saludaron. Ran se entristeció y Sian la miró.          —¿Qué te pasa?          —Me encantaría que Tula estuviera aquí —se sinceró Ran.          —Bueno, por ahora olvidemos el pasado y celebremos nuestro futuro.          —Enseguida vuelvo ―dijo Abel antes de marcharse.          —¡Vamos a bailar! —gritó Sian y cogió a Ran de la mano y salieron a bailar».
