<h3><span style=""letter-spacing: 0px
column2: >The Printpoetics Chapbook Series - Voicing Women through Poetry

column1: Through the publishing of my first poetry book ""ONE"" , I've come in contact with a staggering amount of lovely human beings who have had their rights violated in small or big ways. I can think of no better way to give people a voice, than to use this platform to SCREAM in their place.

In honor of all people who are discriminated against today (and with a certain focus on women for this particular issue) - I have created ""the printpoetics chapbook series"" which as of today, is ready to publish three poetry chapbook volumes. The titles of these chapbooks are
""SIT. STAY."" - Vol. I
""ROLL OVER."" - Vol. II
""PLAY DEAD."" - Vol. III
My hopes for the printpoetics chapbook series is to condense thought provoking material into a series of tiny reads, with a very low retail price
column2: basically quickies with a theme that can be read on a single train ride/ for the duration of sipping a coffee. It's short - and if it's any good (we'll see what you think when you get the books) it might feel as if it ends too soon - but there should be enough material in there to start a thought process of your own.

column1: <h3>What You Give &amp
<ul>

• The minimum funding, in order to receive product, is USD 25. This money will go directly towards the cost of printing and shipping all three books to you when they have all been published , as well helping towards the overall project cost involving the set up cost of proof ordering, production and administration of all three titles.

• ALL contributors who have funded this project will be mentioned in Vol. III with a special thanks - so please include your full name (or the name of someone else if you'd like to surprise and honor them?:)
<li>
<span style=""letter-spacing: 0px
column2: >There is no limit as to how many can contribute to this cause, nor how much you can donate. In no case will there be a need to refund people, since we
column3: > can print as little as one copy of each book :) ... even though that's not the really in line with the ultimate goal of massive impact, is it?

column1: ​

I can feel that many young adults and women today struggle to find their voice. I also find that there is an immense appreciation from my readers when they feel that their stories are told, and printed. Knowing that you're not alone in your experience, makes handling life a little easier, and might even inspire others to reach out and make a mark of their own.

If you are curious to see my previous work, you will find my poetry book ""ONE"" available on Amazon - just search for ""ONE"" and include the author name A.L.D. Chalom in the search field - because in hind sight - ""ONE"" was not a very good title as ANYTHING can pop up in the search field when searching for that word :) We live and we learn!
You can also see snippets of poetry on my instagram page @printpoetics, which is where I have the largest audience (stretching towards 40,000 followers as we speak).
<h3>Risks &amp
It's good if you support something while being fully aware of the project. Therefore
column2: the risks you are taking with this project are minimal and only include two factors:

column1: - You might not like the book(s)
column2: I say this because my previous poetry has been very delicate, while this series includes more non-censured wording. If you are not a fan of the occasional f**k, be aware the book contains some of that wording. I felt I needed it to pack a punch, so I reserve the right to wash my mouth on a different occasion

column1: -There is no rigid release date for the books, except for vol. I which will release on March 8 - International Women's Day. This means, vol. II and vol. III will most likely follow within a 4-6 month span (one each two or three months) depending on production and marketing optimizations.
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
Share this campaign with someone you think might appreciate this effort. Or come say hi on instagram @printpoetics - sometimes knowing you're simply there can give me enough umpf to keep kicking!

And that's all there is to it.

A BIG THANK YOU TO EVERYONE WHO CONTRIBUTES. 

Love to all. 

A.L.D. Chalom

The Opportunity

From April 27 to May 1 I have the opportunity, along with 4-5 other writers, to work with the amazing Linda Sivertsen (a.k.a. The Book Mama) at her Carmel-by-the-Sea writing retreat. Linda is a writer - a New York times bestselling author - a teacher, and a ""seasoned midwife of best-selling books and 6 &

Basically I have dreamed of working with her for years because I know, deep down, working with Linda will bring RESULTS, both personal and (hopefully) professional, and by some universal kismet 1 spot has opened up at her upcoming retreat (this is rare).

As a young writer (and soon-to-be-mama) NOW is the time for me to make this leap, but I truly need your help to make it. If you contribute to my campaign, you aren't just helping me reach a dream - you are supporting art, and you are allowing me to eventually give back to my community through my work.

About the Book

The title of my novel-in-progress is LIES WE TELL. 

4 characters. 4 choices. 1 day. Lives forever altered.
It has been described by a fellow writer as ""Crash meets 24!""

The novel follows four 20-something individuals, in a small, isolated northern town, who have each come to a crossroad in their lives and must make a choice. Their choices will impact not only themselves, but all those around them, and for some the irreversible consequences of their actions will reverberate for years to come.
The title references not only the lies we tell others, but more importantly, the lies we tell ourselves.

It is about loss and regret, but also hope and redemption. It is a deeply personal story that grew from my own life experiences in the small, northern Alberta town I grew up in, but it has turned into a living, breathing piece that stands alone, apart from me.
It has been my dream to share this story, and hopefully many others in the years to come.

What It Will Take

The hard truth of the matter is this retreat is not cheap at $8,000 and we can't do it alone right now.

Here is a general view of the cost broken down:

  • This covers ALL expenses except for travel (which I will provide on my own). That's lodging, food and all instruction.
<li>Instruction includes: daily private 45-minute sessions with Linda and hours of group sessions
column2: hours and hours of quiet writing time
column4: group activities such as hiking (and if you've ever been to Carmel you know how inspiring the landscape can be), etc.

column1: • a private two-hour editorial session with Linda when I'm ready, and after we've returned from the retreat.
• And on top of all of that, connections will be made between myself and the other writers, and I can't begin to tell you how much it means to be part of an amazing community of like-minded artists.

• As a participant I would also receive a copy of Your Big Beautiful Book Plan, which will be insanely helpful for me when I get to the book proposal stage (the ""business plan"" needed when approaching publishers).

• Check out the perks section to see what I can offer in return for your help - hopefully they offer a bit of an incentive, but please note that for certain perks (copies of novel/Character name, etc.) the timeline is TBD since the timing of publication and method of publishing (traditional or self-publish) is still to be determined.
• Be assured that I am constantly brainstorming to come up with new and interesting ways I could reward you guys, because having support for my art means THE WORLD to me!! :-)
<div>
What Happens If I Don't Reach My Goal?
<h3><span style=""font-size: 16px
column4: >I am only asking for the exact amount of the retreat however, in the event that I don't reach my full goal the funds will be placed in a special savings account for either a future retreat in Carmel, or toward business expenses, as I am still continuing forward with my novel.

column1: <h3><span style=""font-size: 16px
column4: >Business expenses? For example, if I self-publish the book the funds could go toward that, or toward the services of a professional editor - a service I would need whether I self-publish or traditionally publish. Either way, the funds will ONLY be used toward the creation and publication of this novel.

column1: <h3><span style=""font-size: 16px
column4: >In the event that I don't raise the full amount, but I come close, I may still be able to go on this retreat if our finances allow, which is why I've chosen flexible funding.

column1: <h3><span style=""font-size: 16px
column4: >If - by some MIRACLE - I am able to raise beyond the set amount, this would allow me to also pay for travel (most likely train, so not too expensive) and lodging at a hotel for 1 night (so I can arrive the day before since there is some travel involved). Any extra after that would be put into a savings account and could be used to offer a bonus reward (it would be awesome if I could afford to give more people copies of the book as a reward!!!)

column1:
The Impact

As I mentioned above, working with Linda is a game-changer. I personally know of a writer who worked with her and recently got a six-figure book deal with a major publishing house, and she has helped many other writers do the same. (This in no way guarantees the same will happen for me, I just want to give you all an idea of the level of talent and expertise I would be working with.) Not only does Linda have the contacts in the industry, but she has the experience, and the gift to pull ideas and entire books out of people that they didn't even know they had.

Attending this retreat would have a greater impact on me than I can even put into words. Life-changing results and relationships. I feel very vulnerable admitting how much this experience would mean for me.

Obviously it means enough to me to crazily put myself out there and ask friends, family and complete strangers to help me out, but in the end I believe my book is worth it, and I believe in my ability to have an impact on other people.
Risks &
column2:
Challenges

Timing is extremely tight and I need to raise this money quickly, so this is a HUGE challenge. But I've never been one to back down when the odds are against me, so why the hell would I do so now. As Barney Stinson would say, ""CHALLENGE ACCEPTED!""

column1:
Other Ways You Can Help

Just because you can't contribute at this time don't sweat it, you can totally share this link and help spread the word!!

column2: >***If you want to follow the journey as I raise funds, and possibly even live tweet during the retreat itself use #CarmelRetreat ***

column1: You can also check out my blogs, www.cateemond.tumblr.com and www.fallingbycate.tumblr.com if you're interested.
","The Opportunity

From April 27 to May 1 I have the opportunity, along with 4-5 other writers, to work with the amazing Linda Sivertsen (a.k.a. The Book Mama) at her Carmel-by-the-Sea writing retreat. Linda is a writer - a New York times bestselling author - a teacher, and a ""seasoned midwife of best-selling books and 6 & 7 figure book deals"".

Basically I have dreamed of working with her for years because I know, deep down, working with Linda will bring RESULTS, both personal and (hopefully) professional, and by some universal kismet 1 spot has opened up at her upcoming retreat (this is rare).

As a young writer (and soon-to-be-mama) NOW is the time for me to make this leap, but I truly need your help to make it. If you contribute to my campaign, you aren't just helping me reach a dream - you are supporting art, and you are allowing me to eventually give back to my community through my work.
About the BookThe title of my novel-in-progress is LIES WE TELL. 4 characters. 4 choices. 1 day. Lives forever altered.
It has been described by a fellow writer as ""Crash meets 24!""

The novel follows four 20-something individuals, in a small, isolated northern town, who have each come to a crossroad in their lives and must make a choice. Their choices will impact not only themselves, but all those around them, and for some the irreversible consequences of their actions will reverberate for years to come.
The title references not only the lies we tell others, but more importantly, the lies we tell ourselves.

It is about loss and regret, but also hope and redemption. It is a deeply personal story that grew from my own life experiences in the small, northern Alberta town I grew up in, but it has turned into a living, breathing piece that stands alone, apart from me.
It has been my dream to share this story, and hopefully many others in the years to come.
What It Will Take The hard truth of the matter is this retreat is not cheap at $8,000 and we can't do it alone right now.
Here is a general view of the cost broken down:  This covers ALL expenses except for travel (which I will provide on my own). That's lodging, food and all instruction.
Instruction includes: daily private 45-minute sessions with Linda and hours of group sessions
column2: hours and hours of quiet writing time
column4: group activities such as hiking (and if you've ever been to Carmel you know how inspiring the landscape can be), etc.

column1: a private two-hour editorial session with Linda when I'm ready, and after we've returned from the retreat.
And on top of all of that, connections will be made between myself and the other writers, and I can't begin to tell you how much it means to be part of an amazing community of like-minded artists.

As a participant I would also receive a copy of Your Big Beautiful Book Plan, which will be insanely helpful for me when I get to the book proposal stage (the ""business plan"" needed when approaching publishers).

Check out the perks section to see what I can offer in return for your help - hopefully they offer a bit of an incentive, but please note that for certain perks (copies of novel/Character name, etc.) the timeline is TBD since the timing of publication and method of publishing (traditional or self-publish) is still to be determined.
Be assured that I am constantly brainstorming to come up with new and interesting ways I could reward you guys, because having support for my art means THE WORLD to me!! :-)
What Happens If I Don't Reach My Goal?

I am only asking for the exact amount of the retreat however, in the event that I don't reach my full goal the funds will be placed in a special savings account for either a future retreat in Carmel, or toward business expenses, as I am still continuing forward with my novel.

Business expenses? For example, if I self-publish the book the funds could go toward that, or toward the services of a professional editor - a service I would need whether I self-publish or traditionally publish. Either way, the funds will ONLY be used toward the creation and publication of this novel.
In the event that I don't raise the full amount, but I come close, I may still be able to go on this retreat if our finances allow, which is why I've chosen flexible funding.

If - by some MIRACLE - I am able to raise beyond the set amount, this would allow me to also pay for travel (most likely train, so not too expensive) and lodging at a hotel for 1 night (so I can arrive the day before since there is some travel involved). Any extra after that would be put into a savings account and could be used to offer a bonus reward (it would be awesome if I could afford to give more people copies of the book as a reward!!!)

The Impact As I mentioned above, working with Linda is a game-changer. I personally know of a writer who worked with her and recently got a six-figure book deal with a major publishing house, and she has helped many other writers do the same. (This in no way guarantees the same will happen for me, I just want to give you all an idea of the level of talent and expertise I would be working with.) Not only does Linda have the contacts in the industry, but she has the experience, and the gift to pull ideas and entire books out of people that they didn't even know they had.

Attending this retreat would have a greater impact on me than I can even put into words. Life-changing results and relationships. I feel very vulnerable admitting how much this experience would mean for me.

Obviously it means enough to me to crazily put myself out there and ask friends, family and complete strangers to help me out, but in the end I believe my book is worth it, and I believe in my ability to have an impact on other people.

Risks & Challenges Timing is extremely tight and I need to raise this money quickly, so this is a HUGE challenge. But I've never been one to back down when the odds are against me, so why the hell would I do so now. As Barney Stinson would say, ""CHALLENGE ACCEPTED!""
Other Ways You Can Help Just because you can't contribute at this time don't sweat it, you can totally share this link and help spread the word!!
***If you want to follow the journey as I raise funds, and possibly even live tweet during the retreat itself use #CarmelRetreat ***
You can also check out my blogs, www.cateemond.tumblr.com and www.fallingbycate.tumblr.com if you're interested.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div> <h3>
139 firefighters died in the last two
years. They died by their own hand. I know how they felt because  I
was a firefighter for 31 years and I narrowly missed being a member
of this group. It is estimated that fully 30% of firefighters suffer
from alcoholic drinking and the numbers grow larger when you add in
the use of drugs. By writing this book I hope to break down the walls
within our secret society and reach firefighters before they drink
themselves to death.
I am compelled to write this book because firefighters,
true American heroes are killing themselves in record numbers rather
than seek treatment, they are hanging themselves in fire stations,
shooting themselves in the cab of a firetruck, and leaving behind so
many grieving people with out reason. They are being treated like
criminals by their departments and are viewed as a liability rather
than as a human being that is suffering greatly. It is more cost
effective to fire them than it is to rehabilitate them.
Firefighters are trapped in a catch 22 life, admit you are suffering
and be ostracized by your fellows or keep it quiet and kill yourself
rather than be thought of as weak.People will read my book for two reasons. The first reason is
because of the macabre nature of voyeurism. That will draw readers
in to see what life is like for firefighters and what that life does
to our minds and souls. The second reason I hope is because
firefighters don't really want to kill themselves and need to accept
that a seismic change needs to occur in our business to help them.
Our own culture of being so heroic, so tough, is the leading cause
of theses suicides
<ul>
<li>
What are the specific benefits of
your book? The benefits of my book are contained in my intimate
knowledge of this world and that I have been there, done that and
survived. I bore witness to suicides and nearly drank myself to
death twice. I have been to rehabilitation four times and am grossly
aware of the shortcomings that the treatment system has to offer
firefighters. Firefighters need therapy and treatment that
recognizes we don't work Monday through Friday 8-5. We live and
exist in a world that no ordinary therapist can comprehend let alone
empathize with or understand, they can't treat what they don't know.
I believe I will have instant trustworthiness from my peers.
• How do you plan on marketing the book? I have already driven
a previous work to the number one spot on Amazon on three separate
occasions with social media campaigns and give aways that resulted
in 13,000 downloads from the Kindle store through KDP. I also am a
very entertaining interview on radio and have done so with my own
resources on many occasions. I promote my own book signings and have
had many successful outings in the past. I am also a public speaker
and have made presentations to many large groups. I plan to reach
out to every fire department in the nation and offer my services to
their organizations in the hope of saving even one life, who can
argue with that?
•  I believe this book
will be in a range 120-160 pages.
<ul>
• I will be done with the full
manuscript by 11/1/2014
•  I plan a workbook to accompany my presentations as
well as an instructional video series.

Je m'appelle Valérie et en 2008 je suis partie sauver le monde!

J'ai passé 2 ans à rencontrer les jeunes qui vivent dans les rues un peu partout en Amérique du Sud (mais surtout au Pérou à Lima). J'avais envie de comprendre, de connaître et peut-être même d'aider quelques un(e)s à se trouver. J'ai fais des projets concrets au tous début, avec l'aide de l'organisme Tous les enfants de l'autre monde (TEAM). Ils m'ont permis de connaitre le milieu et de faire de très belles rencontres. Je vous invites d'ailleurs à visiter mon blog de ces aventures: Six mois avec les enfants de l'autre monde.
Après mes expériences extraordinaires avec TEAM, je suis partie de façon indépendante parcourir les rues et ruelles de l'Amérique du Sud.

Dans tous mes voyage un jeune à retenu mon attention et que j'ai revu chaque fois que je suis passé à Lima. Il s'appel Ruben. Un jeune dans le début vingtaines qui était dans la rue depuis qu'il avait 8 ans alors qu'il s'était sauvé de chez lui parce qu'il était battu. Mais dans la rue, ça n'a pas été plus facile, et d'autan plus qu'il se découvrait comme homosexuel. La première fois que je l'ai rencontré il était encore dans la rue, mais avait arrêté la prostitution, ce qui était déjà un très bon début. Puis chaque fois que je repassais par Lima on se rencontrait et il avait toujours l'air de plus en plus près de la sortie, jusqu'au jour où il m'invita visiter une petite chambre qu'il louait. Ça, c'était une belle victoire pour lui, il en était très fier.

Dernièrement il a communiqué avec moi parce que ont passé vient le hanter, et il doit subir une opération pour enlever des hémorroïdes atroces. Je vous passent les détails. Il lui manque seulement 400$ pour cette opération, soit la moitié. Je n'ai pas toute seule les moyen financiés pour le lui donner, mais tous ensemble je suis certaine qu'on peut y arriver.
Ruben a un grand coeur et aide à travers d'une ong péruvienne (Casa Generacion) à son tour les jeunes dans la rue.

Un jour il m'a dit que c'était grace à moi qu'il s'en était sortie... 0.o 

C'est difficile à prendre ça... surtout que je sais que ce n'est pas seulement grace à moi, mais il a insisté pour dire que j'avais été une des personne les plus influente. Je n'ai peut -être pas changé le monde dans mes voyage, mais j'ai changer le monde d'au moins une personne et je pense que c'est comme ça que ça commence.

Aidez-moi à aider Ruben et continuer à changer le monde.

My name is Moein (pronounced Mo-in) and I’m a 21-year-old student,
author and raw vegan activist.
I became a raw vegan three years ago after years of suffering headaches
and digestive disorders. During this time I read about an Iranian girl, who was
a PhD student of mathematics in Florida, and had bone cancer and it really
affected me. It prompted me to start researching natural ways of preventing
diseases.
I had always been curious about how to achieve optimum health and
happiness and had read countless books and articles related to this subject,
but still I was sick and so decided to delve deeper in an attempt to find the
root cause of disease. Three years ago I discovered Raw Veganism after finding a book about raw eating by Arshavir Ter-Hovannessian and so decided to become a vegan. I’m glad
to say that my health has greatly improved since I made this change.
During my journey I have become more familiar with the philosophy of veganism,
animal rights, peace and harmony.
I have always been
interested in helping others and I have found that through healthy eating I can
make some great changes in people's lives, just as it has changed my life! Now
I want to dedicate my life to helping more people improve their health through
my book. I just need your help to publish and distribute it worldwide.
column2:
>

Moein_ Speaking at 41st International Vegetarian Festival, Malaysia, 2013.

column1: My Book
It has taken
me two years to complete my book and my aim is to help people to improve their
diet by making a few simple changes.
This book is
about the relationship between the food we eat and how it affects the world
around us, including:
·
Our physical and mental health
·
Our environment
·
Our economy
·
And our society
I also want to
help people through my website, which will be completed after finishing my book
project.
I have many
ideas to create a better world. I hope I can realize all of them during my life.
The main aim
of this book is to explain to people the fundamentals of a healthy natural diet
and how it can help improve their health.
I have
referred to many scientific experiments in my book as well as my own personal
experiences.
There are
uncountable different theories but the point of my book is to offer practical
guidance rather than theories. <b>I aim to provide the reader with the most
up-to-date nutritional information.
My ultimate
goal is to help bring health, happiness and peace to people's lives, so it is a
humanitarian purpose, which is beneficial for all.
For more
information on my background and passion for this subject here is an interview with me that appeared on a popular
raw food website.
What I need?
As I'm a young student I don't have enough
money for my quest, despite my unfaltering enthusiasm!  Book publishing worldwide is a big project.
Thankfully today it is much easier to publish books and eBooks and my work has already

received more than 100,000 downloads worldwide (of course it was in Persian first, as I'm Iranian by nationality, and now this book which I'm working on it is English, edited, updated and improved version!). However I still need help to
reach more people who cannot access my work through such means.
I have found a native English editor who is
editing my book now.
But I need your help and support to help me to
raise $6,000 (and more) to fund the following:
·
Printing
and distributing in hard cover format, to make it available for people who
don't have e-book readers or prefer the hard cover format.
·
Marketing/PR
·
Publishing
my book in numerous different languages
I have talked to several publishers and book
marketers all over the world and I have laid some very good foundations. The
only thing that is missing is your support to realize it!
The Effects of Your Support
Although there are many exciting
rewards for supporting this campaign, the greatest reward for helping to make
this book possible is that you’ll be responsible for empowering people to
manifest their values of compassion and wellness in their everyday lives.
As our world
is in crisis particularly environmentally and health wise it is crucial that we
reach out to as many people as possible to make some vital changes before it is
too late. Your help would be greatly appreciated.
For those
people who are generous enough to donate to my cause, with your permission I
will add you to my mailing list so I can provide regular updates on my project
and how their donation is helping me.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you cannot back the campaign
financially, you can still play a vital role by sharing this
link with everyone you know - on your website, on your blog, on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest,
Google+ - and all other social networks.
As I want to publish this health and peace message globally any help regarding
translating my book into other languages would be much appreciated.
How to contact me
For any questions or suggestions, you are welcome to send an email to:
Moin.ghn {{at}} Gmail.com
Or send me a message on Facebook.
I'm looking forward to building a better world, for humans, for animals
and for generations to come.
Thank you for taking the time to read this.
Yours sincerely,
Moein Ghahremani Nejad

column2:
>**All donations are tax-deductible**

The Imagine Sisters Movement

Launched on Pentecost Sunday 2012, the Imagine Sisters Movement uses engaging and high quality media to reveal the beauty of the Consecrated Life to the Church and to the world. A website loaded with content, an interactive forum that allows for dialogue and various social networks serve as the platform that has allowed the Movement to reach a community of over 33,000 followers.

From its initial goal to help young women ""imagine"" the possibility of becoming a religious sister, the Movement has recognized a greater need: to revitalize a culture that has discounted the religious life as a vocation choice. In 2013, Imagine Sisters with Lighthouse Catholic Media produced the first ever feature-length film that captures the beauty of the consecrated religious life. (lightoflovefilm.com) Through resources like Light of Love, the Movement strives to educate believers and non-believers alike
column3:
revealing the truth and beauty of the call to consecrated life and its importance in our Church and in our world.

The Future

With Pope Francis' announcement of the 2015 Year of Consecrated Life, the Imagine Sisters Team has found a new excitement and enthusiasm for the mission and work of the Movement. From its beginning, Imagine Sisters has been run by a small team of volunteers with very minimal funding.  Now, with conviction in our hearts, we desire to bring the Movement to the next level. It seems fitting, in preparation for the Year of Consecrated Life, that the Movement is asking for your help!

Young women need to know that this vocation is an option for them - that God could indeed be calling them - and parents and friends need to know how to support these women in their discernment. Join the Movement. Partner with Us. Pray for Vocations.


You can be part of the mission of the Imagine Sisters Movement:


We invite you to take a look at what we have accomplished in just two years without an office, uncompensated volunteers and no funding for resources and then “imagine” with us the possibilities for the future of this unique, greatly needed ministry in the Church. Whether it’s $1 or $5,000, your donation will be greatly appreciated. Every dollar will help us continue to foster a true sense of dignity in young women that will consequently foster a culture of vocations that is becoming more vibrant with each passing day.



Our Needs:

column1: • Hire a  1-3 person staff to continue to oversee the daily functioning of the Imagine Sisters Movement and keep up with the demand for resources and events.
• Cover operation expenses (office space, website maintenance and hosting, print resources, postage, and travel expenses for events.)

Our Goals:

  •  Enhance and launch the Imagine Sisters Website at the start of the Year of Consecrated Life with deeper, richer content written by religious sisters.
• Can you imagine a new and more interactive design that will engage a culture that is seeking visual beauty? Sure! We have a website now, but just wait until you see what we have in store!

• Deeper content written and by sisters and downloadable resources  that will explore new topics and topics that are the foundation on which girls can build authentic discernment such as identity and what it means to live authentic Catholic womanhood.

• Wait! “What about the rest of us,”  you might be thinking. No worries, we fully intend to produce content for youth ministers, parents, friends and the laity that will help you encourage vocations and support the young women you know who are discerning! Something that is currently lacking on the Imagine Sisters website!

• Launch an interactive Imagine Sisters on-the-go App. This App will feature articles on discernment and the religious life, an up-to-date calendar with discernment retreat and event information and much more!
<ul>
• Working with our friends at Little i Apps LLC, the makers of the apps such as the Confession App and the Catholic Vote App we will create an app thats not only full of content, but full of fun!

• Websites are great, but this App will help girls on-the-go with their discernment needs and questions. Let’s just say, that we also have a few things up our sleeve that will help them better “imagine!”
• Produce and release a video and blog series for the Year of Consecrated Life as well as printed materials that can be used in ministry not only in 2015 but for years to come.
<ul>
• This 12 video series will help young women in discernment and the laity better understand the importance of this beautiful vocation.
• The video series will be coupled with a 24 post blog series that will go even more in depth on topics important to the consecrated life!
• What could be better than print materials that can be used to educate the Church on the religious life? Help us make it happen!
• What do we want to cover? Everything from the vows of poverty, chastity and obedience all the way to the challenges and graces of the daily life!

Help us reach our goal:

    Whether you're able to donate or not, please help us out by simply sharing our campaign on Facebook or Twitter! If you can't donate, can you find someone who can? You can also support us in prayer and by telling your friends, family and parish about the Movement. 

    “One Sister Can Change the World!”
<h3 style=""text-align: center

","**All donations are tax-deductible**The Imagine Sisters MovementLaunched on Pentecost Sunday 2012, the Imagine Sisters Movement uses engaging and high quality media to reveal the beauty of the Consecrated Life to the Church and to the world. A website loaded with content, an interactive forum that allows for dialogue and various social networks serve as the platform that has allowed the Movement to reach a community of over 33,000 followers.From its initial goal to help young women ""imagine"" the possibility of becoming a religious sister, the Movement has recognized a greater need: to revitalize a culture that has discounted the religious life as a vocation choice. In 2013, Imagine Sisters with Lighthouse Catholic Media produced the first ever feature-length film that captures the beauty of the consecrated religious life. (lightoflovefilm.com) Through resources like Light of Love, the Movement strives to educate believers and non-believers alike

Three years ago Drew Mead, after leaving college, discovered a disheartening thing. All of the review sites and blogs claiming to support indie movies were really doing quite the opposite. They were reviewing Hollywood shit labeled indie because the budget was 100 million instead of a quadrillion billion cagillion. The ones who did review indie movies were burying those films under the Hollywood garbage and judging the indie movies by a Hollywood standard. Disgusted and disenchanted, Drew took on the mantel of the B-Movie Avenger. Crusading for truly Independent art, Cult movies and forgotten ""B"" movies, he started B-Is For Best Movie Reviews and More. Overtime he rallied his forces adding Janessa O'malley (his lovely wife) who became Super Nes-S and his delightfully prickish brother Zachary Mead (who became Cac P. Worthington) to his ranks. The group expanded spending their own money to make B-Is For Best reach the masses, gaining exposure for the films they were pushing for..But that wasn't enough! Utilizing the contacts made over the years with the site, The B-Movie Avenger began uniting filmmakers with distributors, Composers, artists etc... All of this came at a price. since B-Is For Best took in no money the bills stacked and now, today Drew Mead and his family are thousands of dollars in debt..This is where you come in! Drew needs your help to pay off the debts as well as to get an HD camera and microphone to improve the quality of our video reviews. To top things off, 1000 dollars of the proposed 10,000 will be used to print, bind and distribute Peter Ferris: Story Of A Pig Fetus, the often sought out but seldom read social satire/dark comedy/splatter screenplay written by Drew Mead! Now you too will be able to enjoy the strange world of a half human, half pig, miscarried mutant, a Japanese pizza Delivery boy and their double ass faced friend as they head out on an epic quest to find desert dolphins!
This is your chance to aid in the fight for Indie cinema..Will you heed the call?

Short Summary

Hello, for those of you who do not know me, my name is Sharon Casey. 

And I have written a story based on real life events that I call:

 Golden Clouds of Heaven

 

It is a true story in written form. It is heartwarming, encouraging
and uplifting. It is a story of a tumultuous, yet blessed, life. In this
life-story there occur's a series of unusual life events:
A deep plunge into the deepest human darkness,
of a life of abusive relationships and drug addiction. A discovery of the soul's way out by re-discovery of the Grace and Love of God.<span style='color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
column3:
'> 

An extraordinary retention and restatement of the Beatific

column1: vision, or the memory of our home of Heaven. A request from an inner
source, to share that memory, with everyone, even though it can only be
imperfect in writing.
column3:
'>

Therefore we are asking everyone, to help us to bring Heaven

column1: a little closer to the world. For the world and nearly all souls here have
forgotten who they are. We would like to show you and everyone, with this
dramatic tale, we are offering.
column5:
'>

“When stillness comes flowing over like a well springing

column1: from the depths of our being…We see your face faint at first than brilliantly
shining with many lights brighter then the Sun itself. We witness the universe
moving within you, swirling slowly, then like a spiraling vortex with lights of
many colors like precious stones of unspeakable brilliance. Within your being,
surely all the heavens dwell. Beams of Lightening extend from your eyes and we
your children of Light stand in awe and wonder.”
column6:
What You Get

How does one describe the indescribable?

column1: By showing it to you!

And this is why we are asking for your assistance in helping us to cover the costs of having this story put into a screen play.

So it can be presented to Productions Companies

Once submitted to Production Companies the story will be put on Film.

And bring Heaven a little closer to the world. Reminding all of us who we are.

column3:
'>

Horngate Media is a new company and we are using our planned first book, Twilight Language, to raise necessary funds to begin production.
Twilight Language is a book detailing the inspirations, obsessions and references behind and within the music of the legendary, vanguard, cross-genre group Coil. From the current draft of the text:
""That is what this book highlights: Coil as occultural nexus. Coil was a repository for ALL of the Arts - arcane and aesthetic - brought together from hidden temples, great museums and the alternative underground, then synthesized through ecstatic ritual and technological innovation to unleash an outpouring of Angels and Abominations, Gold and Sewage, Sex and Death, Matter and Spirit in a totality of Chaos and Dream."" 
The rewards offered here are thus aimed at Coil fans who will want to see this particular book happen but your support now will also open the way for many future works to come, for which you will have our deepest and enduring gratitude.

Short Summary

The students of the MA Creative and Life Writing course at Goldsmiths, University of London are developing a 60-page anthology which showcases some of the brightest and most experimental new voices in creative writing across a variety of forms including fiction, life writing, and poetry.

Goldsmiths students are selected from a large pool of candidates to study and develop their craft at a postgraduate level, so the anthology will be of a high standard and include up-and-coming, and previously unpublished work.
The anthology is designed to launch these writers into the industry by offering samples of their exciting work in an accessible, beautifully designed format.

We will be launching the anthology in London in March 2016, where students will read from the anthology. The evening will be a really important opportunity for Goldsmiths writers to mix with industry professionals and enable them to move on to the next stages of their careers, as well as show their work to public audiences. 

What We Need

We need £800 to cover our all-inclusive venue hire (a bargain for London!). The Goldfish committee is delighted to be working with the staff at Town Hall Hotel in Bethnal Green to create a truly beautiful and inspiring setting for what promises to be a really special evening for our writers and industry friends. Our venue contract includes not just an inspiring space (a stunning art deco council chamber), but access to a delicious menu of canapés, wine, beer, and mixed drinks, as well.
We have also secured a brilliant graphic designer who is willing to create the anthology for us at a hugely reduced fee of £350.

We also need £700 to organise a print-run of over 500 copies. This allows us to disseminate widely, spreading this truly exciting new work to a diverse audience. Each attendee at the event will take a copy of the anthology home, we'll be sending copies out to industry professionals, and we want each of our funders to have their very own copy as a thank you for their support, too.
column2: >All funders names will also be listed in the anthology.

column1: The remaining £650 will be used to cover the printing of invitations and other Goldfish branded materials, as well as the overhead operating costs of running the campaign and the planning committee (including shipping and handling of the anthology to campaign supporters).
We'd love you to offer whatever donation you can afford to help us on our way to building the careers of these exciting new voices in the literary world.
Can you help?

Spread the Word

If you aren't able to donate, you could help us by spreading the word about this campaign!

You can connect with us on social media, sharing the campaign page with friends, family and any relevant audiences who might connect with the project.

Thanks so much for reading - we are enormously grateful for your support.

The Goldfish 2016 Committee

¿Qué es Iberian Starcraft Series?

La ISS es un proyecto que nace como iniciativa de varios miembros de la comunidad española con el fin último de jugar una competición al estilo de la “World Championship Series” ajustando su reglamento y condiciones a los requerimientos y requisitos de los jugadores españoles. Contando con los mejores y más carismáticos jugadores de la escena promete ser una de las iniciativas más interesantes nacidas de la propia comunidad. Con el propósito de potenciar la escena española y portuguesa de Starcraft 2, a la vez que profundizar el enlace entre estas dos comunidades hermanas.

El destino del dinero y recompensas

• Si no se llega al mínimo establecido el dinero será devuelto y no se celebrará la competición. Esto se debe a que queremos que este segundo torneo este al nivel del primero. Cuanto más dinero haya más posiciones serán premiadas y más se incentivará la competición entre los participantes,

• Contaremos con la ayuda de varios de los mejores jugadores de la scene nacional realizando ""coaching"" para recompensar a la gente que done cuantías superiores a 20€. Asimismo para la gente que aporte 10€ o más repartirán Replays dónde podrás aprender las build orders y movimientos de los mejores de nuestro país. (Para más información ver la sección ""Recompensas"")

ISS 2 a fondo

Este proyecto nace con la intención de generar un torneo de calidad con un formato lo más parecido posible a lo que juegan los mejores jugadores del mundo de Starcraft2 pero en nuestro territorio. Tras exitosos proyectos como la Proleague Española, los clasificatorios de eStar o las copas de Supplyzero, creemos que dar la oportunidad a la comunidad de financiar y apoyar a un juego tan habitualmente dejado por las organizaciones mayoritarias de España es una oportunidad única. Gracias a lo recaudado se llevará a cabo un torneo de calidad que podrá motivar a los más nuevos a mejorar y dar nuevos motivos para continuar jugando a los que ya no son recien llegados al RTS de Blizzard.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

No todo gira en torno al dinero. Difundiendo la campaña, viendo las emisiones regulares que realicemos e incluso compartiendo tus opiniones con nosotros por las redes sociales nos estarás ayudando enormemente para alcanzar nuestro objetivo.


","¿Qué es Iberian Starcraft Series?La ISS es un proyecto que nace como iniciativa de varios miembros de la comunidad española con el fin último de jugar una competición al estilo de la “World Championship Series” ajustando su reglamento y condiciones a los requerimientos y requisitos de los jugadores españoles. Contando con los mejores y más carismáticos jugadores de la escena promete ser una de las iniciativas más interesantes nacidas de la propia comunidad. Con el propósito de potenciar la escena española y portuguesa de Starcraft 2, a la vez que profundizar el enlace entre estas dos comunidades hermanas.El destino del dinero y recompensas

Si no se llega al mínimo establecido el dinero será devuelto y no se celebrará la competición. Esto se debe a que queremos que este segundo torneo este al nivel del primero. Cuanto más dinero haya más posiciones serán premiadas y más se incentivará la competición entre los participantes,

Contaremos con la ayuda de varios de los mejores jugadores de la scene nacional realizando ""coaching"" para recompensar a la gente que done cuantías superiores a 20€. Asimismo para la gente que aporte 10€ o más repartirán Replays dónde podrás aprender las build orders y movimientos de los mejores de nuestro país. (Para más información ver la sección ""Recompensas"")

ISS 2 a fondoEste proyecto nace con la intención de generar un torneo de calidad con un formato lo más parecido posible a lo que juegan los mejores jugadores del mundo de Starcraft2 pero en nuestro territorio. Tras exitosos proyectos como la Proleague Española, los clasificatorios de eStar o las copas de Supplyzero, creemos que dar la oportunidad a la comunidad de financiar y apoyar a un juego tan habitualmente dejado por las organizaciones mayoritarias de España es una oportunidad única. Gracias a lo recaudado se llevará a cabo un torneo de calidad que podrá motivar a los más nuevos a mejorar y dar nuevos motivos para continuar jugando a los que ya no son recien llegados al RTS de Blizzard.Otras formas en las que puedes ayudarNo todo gira en torno al dinero. Difundiendo la campaña, viendo las emisiones regulares que realicemos e incluso compartiendo tus opiniones con nosotros por las redes sociales nos estarás ayudando enormemente para alcanzar nuestro objetivo.",0.0,0,"2 Campaigns
|",Spain,https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/iberian-starcraft2-series-temporada-2/pica

This definitely feels like a calling of the soul to be able to serve and teach yoga in a beautiful ashram. The flow has been a process as my main challenge is financial support to achieve this mission. This would as be a wonderful opportunity to learn more about Sikh Dharma which has been my path for the past few years. I feel that this will be a great platform to expand to other communities with love and service. As my real obstacle is finance to create a connection and build a graceful and loving ashram.

Breve reseña
Somos tres mujeres latinoamericanas, para
quienes el día a día se presenta como un reto entre las responsabilidades, el
trabajo y la familia. Hace aproximadamente un año y medio comenzamos a soñar y
trabajar con Vive scrapbook. Vive es un sitio de clases online dirigidas a
crear bienestar y fomentar el disfrute de la historia personal usando la ayuda
del scrapbook, la fotografía y cualquier medio que nos permita capturar lo que
vivimos y compartirlo.
Nuestro objetivo es acompañar a más
personas hispanohablantes en el camino de experimentar, disfrutar lo que hacen,
recordar, agradecer… ¡queremos inspirar a otros a vivir a plenitud!
Estamos comprometidas con el desarrollo
de la industria del scrapbook en español que tiene un futuro prometedor.
Seremos la primera empresa con clases en línea de scrapbook para
hispanohablantes.
Tenemos ya listo nuestro video
promocional donde explicamos con detalle nuestra propuesta de valor (ver arriba). Queremos que
lo veas de primero! y así puedas entender mejor nuestro sueño y ayudarnos a
terminar de construirlo.
Estamos a punto de dar el primer paso con
nuestros clientes. Nuestra página web estará activa a partir del 17 de Julio del 2014.
Nuestra
campaña:
Hoy estamos en búsqueda de fondos para
materializar nuestro sueño. Somos una empresa online, que requiere de una
plataforma tecnológica que soporta la página web en la que estarán disponibles
todas nuestras clases. Hasta ahora hemos invertido USD15,000 en desarrollar el
website y clases para el lanzamiento, pero necesitamos USD45,000 más para poder
materializar el proyecto completo.
Tu aporte:
En Vive queremos tocar muchas vidas.
Estamos muy cerca de alcanzar el objetivo de tener nuestra página web en línea
y disponible pero necesitamos tu ayuda para nuestra entrada en producción.
Cualquier donación que puedas hacer será maravillosa para nosotras.
¿Qué haremos con esos fondos?
<ul>
<li>Queremos ampliar nuestro catálogo de clases. Nuestro objetivo es
tener 24 clases el primer año. Hasta ahora solo hemos producido 4 y
necesitamos de tu ayuda para obtener los recursos para la producción de
muchas más que nos permita tener una oferta amplia para nuestros usuarios.
<li>Fortalecer nuestra plataforma tecnológica para ofrecer mayor
interacción con nuestros usuarios y para integrarnos con herramientas robustas
que nos permitan analizar constantemente la evolución de nuestros clientes
y el mercado.
<li>Hacer crecer nuestra comunidad. Queremos tener 4988 usuarios registrados durante los primeros 12
meses (0.05% del mercado target identificado). Para ello, necesitamos invertir en marketing. Tenemos identificado
una red inicial de blogs y organizaciones que podrían promocionarnos, así
como también una serie de actividades con medios online que estamos
seguros nos ayudarán a traer muchos clientes potenciales a nuestro
website.
¿Cómo más podrías apoyarnos?
<ul>
• Comparte esta campaña con tus amigos a través de tus redes sociales
• Unete a nuestra comunidad a través de:

-  Twitter
        -  Facebook
        -  Instagram
        -  Pinterest
        -  Youtube
        -  Google+
  • También puedes compartirla vía correo electrónico
¿Cómo podemos darte las gracias?

Cualquier forma
de agradecerte el apoyarnos en este sueño, se queda corta
emociona muchísimo tu confianza. Queremos darte un reconocimiento, por favor revisa del lado derecho de la página las opciones que ofrecemos.
En todos los
casos, además de un enorme ¡¡¡GRACIASSS!!! nos encantaría que nos envíes tu
foto a mercadeo@vivescrapbook.com para que seas parte de nuestra galería de donantes.
Para recibir
cualquiera de las recompensas por favor déjanos tu e-mail y te haremos llegar
las instrucciones para acceder a tu regalo de agradecimiento.
Finalmente,
queremos decirte que si no llegamos a la meta de recolección completa de los USD45,000,
haremos un plan de implementación parcial donde limitaremos el catálogo de
clases al número que podamos producir con los fondos obtenidos. Igualmente,
revisaremos las prioridades de las inversiones en marketing y tecnología para
cubrir lo más importante. Así que ten la seguridad que igualmente tu aporte
valdrá la pena y MUCHO.
Cualquier
contribución será bienvenida.
Muchas gracias
por acompañarnos en este proyecto que nos ayudará a transformar vidas.
¡Disfruta tu

historia de vida!

Vive scrapbook
-- english version--
Briefing
We started to work on this dream one and
a half years ago. Vive scrapbook is a website of online courses that connects
users with their life experiences and help to document them through the
scrapbook, photography and other artworks. We are three latinamerican entrepeneurs
women in the middle of everyday challenges with professional, family and
personal roles. We have a vision to create a community wherein people can
experience, share, enjoy, remember, be grateful… We want to inspire people to
live to the fullest!
The scrapbook industry in spanish has a
promisory future, we’re commited to it. We are the first organization with online
scrapbook classes in spanish.
Vive promotional video is ready! (see above) And we
want you to see it first. It explains our value proposition to customers so it
will help you to understand our dream and hopefully help us to make it
happened.
Countdown is moving very fast… on July 17th, 2014 we will be LIVE!
Our campaign:
So, what are we missing? We are raising funds for our project. As an online organization, we require a tecnological
platform to support our website and the courses development. So far, we have
put on the table USD15,000, but we need at least USD45,000 more to be able to
accomplish our initial objectives.
Your help:
This project aims at touching lifes. We
are pretty close to reach our goal to have our final website available but we
need your support to put it online and increase our classes portfolio. Any
amount you can donate to help this project will be wonderful for us.
What exactly we want to do with this
money?
<ul>
<li>Increase our classes portfolio to 24 during first year of
operations. We have produced four so far so we need resources to produce
many more for our customers.
<li>Strenght our technological platform to offer a richer interaction to
our users and to be able to integrate powerful tools to constantly analyse
our customers evolution and market.
<li>Make our community BIG! We want to reach 4988 registered users in year 1 (0.05% of our identified potential target). Hence, we need to invest in
marketing. We’ve identified a good number of blogs and organizations that
can help us to promote our offer. Also there are many activities with
online media we plan to do to attract users.
What else can you do to help?
<ul>
• Share this campaign with your friends through your social media accounts
• Join our online community in our social media:

- Twitter
        - Facebook
        - Instagram
        - Pinterest
        - Youtube
        - Google+
<ul>
• You can also share it via e-mail
How can we thank you?
There is no act
of gratitude that can represent how excited and happy we are for your trust and
support. Anyway, we want to offer you a gift, please see in the right side of the page, the available options.
Besides a huge
THANKS, we’d love you sent us a picture of yourself to mercadeo@vivescrapbook.com that we can upload in our
donors gallery.
Please leave us
your e-mail address so we can send you the instructions to access your gift.
Finally, we
want to let you know that if we don’t reach the USD45,000 goal
our plan to implement as many classes as we can with the received funding and
we will redefine our marketing and technological investments to make sure we
cover the most important elements. So please remain sure that your donation will
help us… and will actually help us A LOT!
Any
contribution is very welcome!
Thank you
again. You’re contributing to transform lifes
Enjoy your life
history!

Short Summary

We came together to create 'HER CROWN'! Us being two women who shared similar experiences, who come from similar backgrounds, and share the same values of life, we believe destiny brought us together for a common cause. Together we've written this ""self love"" book to share our individual journeys into womanhood with the world in hopes to encourage young women who feel and see life and view the world in ways that we do. We want to be able to give young girls and women coming into their own LOVE and LIGHT, guidance to help them along their journey, to show them that they too can make it.

'Her Crown' is not a memoir, this is a collective full of wisdom and experience, which we feel the world has yet to offer. This book is a compilation of our thoughts, lessons, trials, triumphs, spiritual growth, and conversations between the two of us that we wish to share with our sisters to empower them and reassure them of their worth. 'Her Crown' is more than a mere title, it is a STATEMENT! An affirmation that we are Queens, by birth
column2:
and every day as we go along, whether we are conscious of it or not, we are always on our way further into our Queendom.

We are very passionate about 'Her Crown' and its message and we would LOVE to share our journeys with other women who are struggling with the same issues we have struggled with growing up and have dealt with. We are doing this so women do not have to go through the pain that we did or if they are going through life's trials, we want to make it apparent that all is well, always. We want to help women reach a point in their lives where they can look back on everything that they have gone through, smile, and know that none of it was in vain.

What We Need &
column3:
What You Get

We will need $4,000 to get the book published and to also cover all of the other production cost.

Let's take a minute to talk about perks! We have many to offer, so don't think you have to choose just one! We have stickers, pins, bookmarks, totes, t-shirts (all stamped with the Her Crown logo), signed copies of our book, and even a change to kick back and dine with us!

If we do not reach our goal (lets be positive and optimistic about this!), all of the funds we receive, and we do mean EVERYTHING, will still go towards the HER CROWN book and brand!


The Impact

This book is something we feel that women all over the world need to read. This book is destined to uplift women who look like us, breathe like us, eat like us, dress like us, dance like us
column4:
who are motivated by what we are motivated by, which is live and love itself. This book was written for the reader to rise above the low bar that society has set for them, to motivate these women to better themselves and know that better days are to come. 

We already have a lot of women who follow us on social media who have kept going and growing based off of posts we have shared, so imagine what we can do (with your help) with our book!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot monetarily contribute, we ask that you please show us love and get the word out! Share our pictures and video on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, even word of mouth will help out! Every bit helps! The more people in the world know about it, the more we can share our love and light!


We thank you in advance.

Peace &
column6:
Jazzy
